288b6: sangs rgyas lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa yang / sring gsum sems can thams cad kyis// rga dang 'bras bu'i gzugs rnams kun// chos kyi dbyings las byung zas na// dbyer med don gyi gti mug pas// rnam par
288b7: snang mdzad rang bzhin yin/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// bde sdig tshor ba'i phung po kun// mnyam par dbyings la snang bas na// ngo rgyal chen po'i rang bzhin pas// myong ba rin chen 'byung ba yin// srid
288b8: gsum sems can thams cad kyi/ / yul dang shes rab phra rags kyi// byed pa'i phung po thams cad kun// ma 'dres dbyings la snang bas na// / shes rab rlabs kyis 'dod chags pas// sdang ba mtha' yas rang
289a1: bzhin no/ / drid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// dge dang mi dge gnyis gamin// sems las byung dang bzang ba'i// 'du byed phung po thams cad kun// spobs dbyings las byung bas na// rnam par grol
289a2: 'i phrag dag pas/ / ded yong grub pa'i rang ba 'a yin// sred gsum sems can thams cad kyi// ra ba smin rang sems da gapa'// shes brgyad dam shes phung po kun// rig pa'i dbyings la shar bas na// zhe sdang chen po'i
289a3: ye shes pas/ de sems dpa'i rang ba na yin zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni chen po lnga dbyings phrag lnga'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ sdeng bcad 'jeb thams cad kyi// gsal stong mi sgrib go 'byung ba'o// snang stong
289a4: nam mkha'i khams rnas kun/ / stong ci dbya yal shar bsan// thams cad gnas pa'i glog yin pas// / bde gshegs dbyings phyug rang bzhin yed// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// srab rtan byed sran
289a5: rten dmas kun/ / sal khams su grags pa rnams// me 'gyur dbyi ga la shang bsan// thams cad skyed pa'i chen yin pas// rdo rje dbangs phrag ngang bzhin yin// sdong bcud 'gro ba thams cad rtse// thos
289a6: gsher ba' mtshan nyid kun/ / chu'i khams su grags pa sa// kun sde dbyings su shar ba san// yon tan tshogs chen kun sdud pas// rin chen dbyis phyug rang bzhin yin// snong bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/
289a7: gal ze 'ang bro thams cad kun// me baM khams su gags pa / sa pa dbyi al shar bas na// gsal rje srog pa'i rang bzhin pas// padad+ma ma'i dbyings pA ga rang bzhin med// snod bcud 'grub thams
289a8: cad kyi/ / yang gape 'dags skyed thams cad kun// rlung gi khams su grags pa ste// bskyod chen dbyings la shar bas na// thogs med shugs bskyod rang bzhin paso// las kyi dbyings phyug rang bzhin yid zhes gsungs so//
289b1: 'di ri rnam par shes pa ba'i byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsus pa/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// kha dog dbyigs la gcod pa kun// mig gi rnam shes zhes su grags// mthong ba'i ye shes yin pa'i
289b2: sang po'i rang bzhin yin/ / srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sgra rnams kun la spyod pa kun// rna ba'i rnam she/ zhes su gnas// thom pa'i ye shes yin pas na// lag na rdo rje'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams
289b3: rnams can la gcod pa kun/ / sna yi rnam shes zhes su grags// tshor ba'i ye shes yin pas na// nam mkha'i snying po'i rang bzhin yin// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// ro rnams kun la gcod pa kun// lce 'i rnam shes
289b4: shes su / / nga ba'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir// stan ras gzigs kyi rang bzhin yin zhes gsungs so// de la yul bzhi byang chub chen po bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs ga snod bcud 'tho ba thams cad kyi// kha dog dbyibs dang mtshan ma kur/
289b5: gzugs kyi sku ched nyid du grags// mthong bar bya ba'i yul yin pas// gzugs mdzes la phyi'i rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// zin dang ma zin gnyi ga las// byung ba'i sgra yi khams su grags// thos par bya ba'i/
289b6: yul yin pas// l+r-id t+ya ma yi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// lhan cig phyis dang sbyar dang gyur// zhim dngang dang de bzhin gzhan// dri yi khams dang skye mched de// bsnam par bya ba'i yul yin pas// mA le nyid kyi
289b7: rang bzhin yin/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// kha mngar la sogs ro rnams kun/ yaM skye mched nyid du grags// myang bar bya ba'i yul yin pas// gi ra ti nyid kyi rang bzhin yin zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dbang po bzhi
289b8: byang chub sems dpa' bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// mthong byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de// mig gi khams shes bya bar grags// mthong ba'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir// byam pa mai tri rang bzhin yin//
290a1: srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// thos par byed pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid de// rnga ba'i khams zhes bya bar grags// thos pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir// sgrib pa kun sel rang bzhin yin// sring gsum sems can thams
290a2: cad kyi/ / srom byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de// sna 'i khams zhes bya bar grags// tshor bar bya ba byed pa'i phyir// 'jam dpal nyid kyi rang bzhin yid// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// myong byed dag pa'i bdag nyid de// lce yi kham
290a3: zhes bya bar grags/ / myod pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin zhes gsungs so// de la ngas bzhi'i mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi'i rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// chu 'bras kun tu
290a4: rnam par snang / / sngon 'das dus su rnam par grags// sngon 'das dpyid kyi rang bzhin yin// spos me'i rang bzhin nyid yin no// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// rgyu spyad 'bras bum spyad kun// de ltar dbyar gyi rang bzhin
290a5: yin/ / me tog nyid kyi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ rgyu 'bras yongs kyis ma sprad pa// ma 'ongs dus su rnam par grags// 'od ma rig ston rang bzhin ni// A lo ki yi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba
290a6: thams cad kyi/ / chu 'bras nges par ma tshags pa// 'byung bar ma des duni shes grags// ma 'ongs kun gyi rang bzhin ni// gan d+he'i rang bzhin yin par des shes gsungs so// de la 'di ni lus kyi dbang po dang // rnam par shes pa dang /
290a7: yang de'i yul dang de las snang ba'i byang chub sems khro bo bzhi'i rang bzhin dugasungs pa/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyis// reg byed dang ba'i bdag nyid de// lus kyi khams shes bya bar grags// reg ba pa byed
290a8: pas na/ / gshin rje 'joms pa'i rang bzhin no// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi/ reg bya kun la gcod pa kun// lus kyi rnam shes zhes su grags// reg pa'i ye shes yin pa'i byed// rnam par rgyal ba'i rang bzhin yin/
290b1: srid gsum sems can thams cad kyis// byung dang 'byung 'gyur reg bya rnams// reg bya'i skye mched nyid du grags/ reg par bya ba'i yul yin pas// rta mchog dpal gyi rang bzhin no// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// tshogs drug
290b2: gags kyi de ma thag/ go byed gsal ba'i bdag nyid de// yid kyi khams zhes bya bar grags// des gcod bya ba byed pa'i phyir// bdud rtsi'i 'khyil ba'i rang bzhin yin zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni phyin ci ma log pa bzhi'i lha mo bzhi'i
290b3: rang bzhin du gsungs pa/ snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// 'jig dang skad cig me rtag pa// rtag par ma yin zhes grags// sna ma lta bu yin pa'i phyir// lcags kyu ma yi rang bzhin yin// sno bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// kur rtog/
290b4: gzhan dbang med min pa// chad par ma yin zhes su grags// rmi lam lta bur sems snang phyir// zhags pa ma yi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// gzung 'dzin dngos por ma 'grub pa// mtshan mar ma yin
290b5: zhes su grags/ / smig rgyu lta bur sems snang phyir// lcags sgrog ma yi rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// skyes bu med par ma grub pa// bdag tu ma yin zhes su grags// sgra brnyan lta bu'i sems snang phyir//
290b6: dril bu ma yi rang bzhin yin zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni yid dang chos gtso gzungs gnyis kyi rang bzhin du bstan te/ srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// chos rnams kur la nges gcod pa'i// yid kyis rnam shes
290b7: zhes su grags/ / rtog pa'i ye shes yin pa'i phyir// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin// snod bcud 'gro ba thams cad kyi// 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kun// chos kyi skyed byed yin par grags// rnam par shes pa'i yul yin/
290b8: bas// kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin yin// de la sogs te mtha' yas mchog/ chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa// nam mkha' khams kyi mtha' klas pa// ji snyed rnam grangs yod pa'i chos// kun kyang phyag rgya'i rang bzhin//
291a1: pas/ rang bzhi dkyil 'khor chen po yis/ rnam grangs yin par rgyal bas gsungs shes ched du brjod pa gsungs so// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchag gi bdag pos des rang bzhin kun rdzogs kyi
291a2: dkyil 'khor 'ang gsungs so/ / kun rdzob mar na ma'i gnas chen kyang // 'og min bla men gnas mchog gas// lcang lo can nam bde ba can// pad ma can le legs pa yi// rang bzhin ldan grub dkyil 'khor re// mtshan ma'i
291a3: rnal 'byor rol snang / / de yang rnga lnga bu zhe na/ mkha' 'am yid kyi nam mkha' la// 'byung chen brtsegs pa'i lhar gyis grub// de steng rin chen sna ba'i las// ldan sa grub pa tshang dpag med// de la brten pa'i sa bzhi ni// rin
291a4: tshogs btsal du bsam/ / man na des bdeg 'bar mdzes pa'i ga'i// de la po brang gzhal med khang // kri ba'i lam pa mdzes par snang // den chen swa ba la shra pas grub// glo bur bzhi yang 'khor thabs tshul// bum pa'i
291a5: de so chos kyi tag/ ma bya'i mdengs dang ldan pa'o// sgo ba'i sgo khyad bzhi dang ldan// rta babs brgyad pa yang dag ldar// dbus na 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// lte bar bcas shing rtsibs rten ldan// gru chad par khams mdzes par ldan//
291a6: chen 'od zer 'bar ba 'khrigs// sems can pad ma'i zla dang // rin chen 'bar ba'i gang na mchog ldan na rin gri rkang rnam brten ldan// pho brang de'i gdan mchog kyang // nyi bla nor bu rin chen 'bar// bla re rgyal mtshan na
291a7: bza' gdugs/ / ngar dang padra mu gteg 'phreng // dril bu dang ni rnga yab sogs// rol mo'i cha byang sna tshogs brgyan// 'jig rten sna tshogs mdzes pa dang // de la sogs te brgyan rnams kyang // bsam gyis mi khyab mtha'
291a8: mcheg/ gzhal yas de yi sgo bzhin// klang chen rnams kyis mdzes par byas// rta babs rnams kyi cong cong dang // gser gyi dril bu 'bar ba dag/ dkon mchog gsum gyi mtshan yang sgrogs// sgo drung de dag re re na// ta
291b1: la'i steng shid tseng cing 'khril/ / dring gzugs dang 'od du ldan// ta la'i steng shing de la// khu byug la sogs pag shis pa'i// byarnams snyan pa sad kyang 'byin// blo drug de dag re ren/ 'grus kyi rdzing bu dbyibs legs
291b2: blo mchog yan lag ldan pa'i chu/ / grangs med de dag re re ni// lha dang lha mo bsam mi khyab// phyi rol kho ra khor yug na// rtses 'chags brjod mi lang // de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog/ ma btsal ye nas
291b3: lhun gyis zung / / lha mchog rnams kyi bsod nams kyis// rgyu las grub par rgyal bas gsungs// pho brang de na gnas pa yis// ye shes lnga tshegs mang po rnams// gtso gzungs zung du 'khril ba ste// dbus kyi bzang
291b4: snying po la/ / rnam par snang mdzad snying po che// 'dzam bu na ta'i gser 'od 'dra// rang rtags lag na 'khor lo bsnams// dpa' bo de yi spyan sngan// rdo rje sems dpa'i rgyan chen yang // dung dang shel gyi kha dog 'dra// rang rtags
291b5: lag na rdo rje 'dzin/ / g.yis su rin chen 'byung ldan to// bai dUr+ya yi kha dog 'dra// rang rtags rin chen 'bru brgyad 'dzin// rgyal ba snang ba mtha' yas gtso// bar ma ra ga'i mdog 'dra zhing // rang rtags pad ma dmar po 'dzin/
291b6: g.yon du don yod grub pa ste// in tra nI la ljang ku'i mdog/ rang rtags phyag na ral gri 'dzin// kun kyang zhi ba'i cha lugs te// thor tshugs rigs lnga dbu la rgyan// rdzogs pa'i skyil krung tshul du bzhags// do shal dpung
291b7: brgyan se mo / / phyag gdub stan chas kun la mdzes// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag rdzogs// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// kAn tu bzang dang lo tsan// ma mAgos dkar sgrol ma rnams// g.yas pas thabs kyis gcol 'khrung /
291b8: g.yon pas rang rtags dril bu 'dzin// skra mdog cha lugs yab dang 'dra// 'khor lo rtsabs la lhun gyis grub// sun snga'i glo bur mdzes pa la// lag na rdo rje sngo lha'i mdog/ rang rtags rdo rje rtsegs pa 'dzin// g.yas nas yi
292a1: snying po ste/ / ljang sngon rin chen myug gu 'dzin// rgyab tu nam mkha'i snying po ste// mthing ga rang brtags ral gri 'dzin// g.yon du mdzes pa'i glo bur la// spyan ras gzigs dbang dmar s+ya ste// rang rtags par ma
292a2: dkar po 'dzin/ / ther tshugs ye shes sems pas brgyan// sems dpa'i skyil me krung du bzhugs// rgyan dang cha lugs kun gyis brgyan// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// gar dang sgeg mo phreng ba dbyangs// g.yas pas
292a3: thabs kyi gtso la 'khyung / / g.yon pa gar dang me long phreng // pi zang 'dzin cing cha lugs gzhan// gtso bo nyid kyang mthun pa yin// mdzes pa'i gru chen rnams la ni// byams pa me tri dkar ba ste// mdzes pa'i klu yis
292a4: dgu de bsnams/ / shar lho mtshams kyi gru chad la'o// sgrib pa rnam sel mthing ka ste// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin pa ste// lho nub mtshams su mdzes par gnas// 'jam dpal gzhon nu mar skya'i mdog/ rang rtags
292a5: ud pal mthing ka 'dzin/ / nub byang mtshams su mdzes par gnas// kun tu bzang po ljang ser mdog/ rang rtags rin chen snye ma 'dzin// byang shar mtshams kyi glu la gnas// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// spos dang me tog gdug pa dri/
292a6: g.yas pa thabs kyi gtse la khyud// g.yon pa rang rtags 'dzin pa'o// cha lugs thams cad snga ma bzhin// sgo khyud rnams la 'joms pa ni// gshin rje gshed po mthing nag 'bar// nir mgo gdengs pa lag mtshan thogs// shar gyi sgor ni
292a7: rnam par gnas/ rnam par rgyal ba ser nag 'bar// rdo rjes gnod pa lho skor ro// rta mgrin dmar nag 'bar ba ste// thod sbrul thogs pa nub sgor gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ldang nag 'bar// rgya gram gyis gnon byang gi sgor//
292a8: stang thabs tshul du rab tu gnas// dur khrod rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// rnam par gcig la 'jigs 'jigs lta// med dkyang 'bar ba'i klong du 'khyil// hA dang phaT kyi sgra chen sgrogs// de dag gi ni g.yon rol na// gshed mo dang ni rgyal ma
292b1: nas/ srin mo dang 'khyil mo rnams// lag patshan lcags kyu zhags pa dang // sgrog dang dril bu thogs shing rngam// cha lugs 'joms pa dag dang 'dra// sgo khyud dag tu lhun gyis grub// mdzes pa'i bar khyams de nyid la// sprul skra thub pa chen mo
292b2: 'dul thabs kyi sar ston pas/ / galags ma ngas 'dul bar ston// mdzes pa'i bar khyams de nyid las// mdun dang rgyab kyi phyogs rol la// byed pa po dang bya ba po// nam mkha' yi ni mdog 'dral// ting nge 'dzin du ldan par gan
292b3: sa te mtha' yas pa dag/ brjed med brjod du med pa yas// lha'i tshigs kyis gang bar gnas// dkyil 'khor bas pa yas lhan gyis grub// d+ha mi gas che dang ngag gis// thugs kar ye shes sems dpa' gnas// ren ka
292b4: ma pa'o/ / ljang la rang rtags yi ge rnams// rang nags phyag rgya'i steng du gsal// de lha'i sku mchog re ra la// tshul dgu dag dang ldan pa ste// mnyen dang lcags dang 'khril bag dang // ldes bag chags dang gzhon tshul can//
292b5: mtshang dang ldan rtag dang // gzi brjid 'bar bar rab tu gnas// de ltar rang bzhin dkyil 'khor nas// phyi rabs sngags 'chang rnal 'byor pas// sman drangag mchod pa 'bul ba'i 'os zhes gsungs pas chos thams cad dang bzhi
292b6: 'khar du dz+nyAn gyis grub po/ / / de nas smra ba'i seng ge la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i 'khor chags rnams rang radag bsam pa rangs par gyur te/ a la la zhes bya ba'i sgra pU nas mgrin gcig tu ched du rjod pa'ang brjod /
292b7: rags dang mi dmigs brtan g.yo mas kun lhun grub dpag ma yang // rang rig yon tan dpag med bsam yas mang po des kun brjod mi lang // gsang sngags rgya mche thugs rjes bsam yas bsam gyi khyad ji snyed dpag ma la
292b8: parnas te gang gA' ba snyed 'gro ba ches ston zhing khams khyab ces ched du brjed de le ste spang ngo / / de nas bcomaldan 'das gsang ba mchog gis bdag po des mi g.yo ba rnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhug
293a1: ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur du rung ba tsam du rtogs shing // de tsa'i phyir zhan/ chos thams cad de ring nge 'dzin ji
293a2: ltar 'dod pa de ltar dbang bsar pa'o/ / 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs 'di lta ste/ gsang sngags ya mtshan chen po 'di// ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor bas ma yas kyang // mdor bsdus rnam pa gsum yod de// sgom pa'i ting 'dzin
293a3: dkyil 'khor dang / / skyed dang lhag pa'i ting 'dzin no// thog ma'i rnal 'byor nyid bsgoms te// dkyil 'khor yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de yang ji ltar bsgom zhe na// ting nge 'dzin kyang rnam gsung ste// dang por de bzhin nyid kyi
293a4: dang / / de bzhin nyid la gnas pa'i phyir// stong pa chen po'i ting 'dzin bsgom// gnyis pa kun snang nam mkha'i dang // snying rje yum gyis khyab pa'i phyir// masas nga den pa'i tid 'dzin bsgom// gsum pa rang gi sa bon nam// rab tu
293a5: brtan pa'i yig 'bru a/ / de las pra mo a 'phros 'dus// spros shing bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med// de las bdag nyid chen por bsgom// ma lus thams cad rdzogs par gsal// rgyas btab byin rlabs dbang bskur bas//
293a6: rtsal ba'i dkyil 'khor bar du rdzogs// de bzhin dbyings las shar bas na// bdag nyid chen po g.yon du ste// mkha' dbyings rdo rje pad por ldan// de ni bskom pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// skyed pa yang ni 'di lta ste// lho tshogs
293a7: bdag gi sras su bzhed/ / de nas skyes pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// de yang ji ltar bskyed can// zag par yab yum mkha' rnams gnyis// rdo rje med pa da gyes par 'khril pa las// b+ha ga'i dkyil du
293a8: 'angags/ / 'phro 'du pyadas su tham pa las// dbang chen sa bon 'bru lngar d+hu ra// e ya ba sa 'bu/ a nyad 'dus pas na sa mkhar gas pa/ da// nga las bdud rtsi'i rgya tshong bskyes/
293b1: gser gis bris mar bskyed// buM las ri rab gzhal med khang // dbyibs dang kha dog chad dpag med// 'khor le'i gdan dang rol ma'itshogs// rang bzhin kun rdzob ci 'dra ba'o// de ru lha tshogs bskyed pa ni// brtan 'byung
293b2: mkha' yi yi ge a/ / 'phel 'grib med par gnas pa ste// gnyis med dgyes pa'i 'phro 'dul// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'od du shar// ka kha ga g+ha ra/ tsaNarba dzAnya/ Da Tha Ta d+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ ba pa waM b+ha ma/ ya wa ral sha Shas
293b3: he kA/ a kA I I yU A da rI li lI me e/ oM oM a AHgsang gi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// spro bsdu gsal bar gyur pa las// thugs mtshan bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'bar// de las mngon rdzogs par gsal ba// thal soms pa'i
293b4: yig 'bru lnga/ / phung po lnga yis pon yin// tha la sogs pa 'byud pa lnga// bskyed pa'i sa bon yin par grags// ka la sogs pa'i yig 'bra lnga// rnam shes lnga yis bon yin// tsa la sogs pa'i yig 'bru lnga// mig gi
293b5: 'jam la sogs pa lnga/ / la la sogs pa'i 'byung ba lnga// gzugs sogs skye mched rnam lnga yin// ya la sog pa'i yig 'bru bzhi// dus bzhi'i sa bon rab tu grags// shal sogs pa'i mig 'dra bzhis phyin ce ma log ngas
293b6: bzhir bshad/ / aM la sogs pa'i yig 'bra drug/ rdul snyed thub pa drug tu bshad// oM ni yid kyi khams yin te// k+Sha ni yid kyi rnam pa shes khams// oM ni chos kyi khams su bshad// so so thugs mtshan gsol ba las// sa bon
293b7: rnams kyis mngon rdzogs bskyed/ oM hU~M badz+ra d+ha ga/ sa drug/ a a ral prang drug/ mAn rI shwa ri/ lad dri shar tsi/ maM mo ha ra ti/ pA rA ga ra ti/ rje badz+ra hi/ k+Sha Ni rA dzA ya/ tra~M a ga ra b+ha ya/ hri ha hA pa ma/ dzang
293b8: ra ba na tri/ hA lA s+yai/ tra mA le/ bI gir ti/ a ni t+yaM/ ma d+ha ra na/ TA ma na swa ra b+ha ya/ swa ra tsi ya/ mu shr-i a rA ga ya/ dza d+hU ba/ hUM puSh+pa ba d+hi pa ho gnaH/ hA pa mAn ta kr-id/ dA pad mAn ta krid/ hUM bag+hi nan ta krid// dza badz+ra kro d+had+hA
294a1: ra kyad/ ba marga na/ dkar ma kraH/ dab te/ a brdzas ma ya san gsun pa/ ba dang / datha/ pa // yun ya sas ga sa yas// yang rdzogs mang dgasal ba dang / gas yi
294a2: yu ge/ zhug sung shugs su kyan bya ga/ bad shAn+da ta dran jug b+ha gas 'a / a ma tA a ta gan sa thab da pa'o/ mnya ma ma da badz+razazla pa yang bas/ as khram brab gdan
294a3: b+hA ba Ams 'dzi zer na badz+ra prab+hA 'i a ma ka / oMs cagag ta a ma ko/ oM sarba ta thA ga dag badz+ra swA b+hA ba ad mako ta/ a sa rbata thA ga ta
294a4: badz+ra swa b+hA ba ad ma ka haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA dza badz+ra swa bu ga.ad la ha// de nas rdzogs pa'i sangs rgas nam// sku i chog zugs mtshan bzhugs tshul dang // thor tshugs la sogs cha lugs kun// rang bzhin kun rdzob
294a5: dkyil 'khor 'di/ / rnal 'byor rig pa'i rtsal yin te// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su bsapa// yang na gzag bdan dkyil 'os so// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// de ltar gsal ba'i rnam pa kun/ yum gyi mkha' las
294a6: gsal bar bsgom na la 'byor dag par khyad par re zhes gsungs pas 'dus pa'i 'khor tshogs thams cad bya sa thams ca 'i de 'dzin gyis dbang bsna par mthong ngo / / 'phags brgyad kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i
294a7: mdozhes bya ba sa ting nge 'dzin kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par phye ba 'ale' ste dag pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag pos gzugs brnyan la brnam par 'phro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms
294a8: par zhugs nas la da ba'i rnal 'byor pa yid ches par bya ba'i bar 'dus pa'i 'khor chogapa rnams la bka' stsal pa/ 'dus pa'i 'khor tshegs rnams chos thams cad ni gagang de / bu'o rnam pa yin par shes par bya'o//
294b1: de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos thams cad ni gzugs brnyan lta bu'i rnam par snang zhing de la 'das pa'i phyir ro// de bas gzug pa brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor ci 'dra bar byas yid nyon cig/ de la 'di ni rgyud kyi rnam yangs so// mi shes
294b2: pa yi 'thob la/ / mtshon pas gsal ba'i dod da par// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad par bya// de yang ji lta bun na// ta ni mdzes pa'i bdabu la// 'jam por zhal zhal byas nas ro// khadog lnga yi gzugs
294b3: bris pa de yang dngas ba rten du bshad/ / ra shi shud nas// la'i lo ma'am du rjod pas// zhing nangs la sogs pa la// phyag d+ha'i gzugs su bris na yang // mtshan pa 'byung ba'i rten du bshad// rdo dang
294b4: la rdo la sogs dang / / drang dam pa / marga'am gzugs su 'thur btod nas// de yang dang/ zab 'brang ba'i rten// gser dngul zangs khar la sogs la// mkhas pas legs par lugs byas te/
294b5: ngan lag ma nyams gzugs pas na de yang gnang bshad// klag she byed du bshid bu'am// smad shing mnyan la gzugs byas na// de rnams mtshan pa'i rten du bshad// sbyin zhing mnyan pa'i rta rnams la
294b6: phyag d+ha'i gzugasas legs bas na/ / de yang ma pa garten yin no// steng dbebs legs mdzes pa la// rdul mtshan 'dus byas rgya rnams kyis// brnyan ma'i dkyil 'khor byas na yang // de yang dngos grub rten
294b7: de shegalas kyi dang po las/ / sa skad dpapa'a'ang byas pa shis// 'as gsungs so// de la 'di ni gam kyi mtsham da // sa stengs pa yi gnas mchog kyang // so pon pa zag shes pa las// srang phreng gas
294b8: su shes par bya/ / ri bo ri man 'das pa'i sri// / gangs ni zag dgar 'dabs rtsa ni// sing can 'khra ba'i gnas zhes pa// zhi ba'i las la de shis so// ga zhen dgo pa med pa dang // brag chen rdo rje gtams pa'i dkyil//
295a1: gcan chen latha ba'i gnas zhes bya// mngon par spyod pasab pa'i gnas/ drar khrong gnas dang dpa klog dang / sram ma grog lan bzung ba'i gnas// dung gcan lakhra ba'i gnas pa'o/ dbang du bsdu ba sgrub pa'o/
295a2: ga nags la mang po bsgribs pa dang / shin tu btsa 'jigs pa 'das/ ka' thaga' gnas zhes bya// 'dod pa gsas pa'i gnas yin no// mcho// rku bdo d+ham 'i 'jig mi sems can pa'i gnas/
295a3: dacan 'thab kanas zhes bya/ las rnams kun la de shes so// ri bo 'dun pa'i che rnabs dang // tsan dan dgas ral me tog 'tshal// yid 'ong bkra shas nyams dka' yas// gnas su dkyil 'kha
295a4: za ba shas/ gnam dngas dang bar snang rnams// legs par brtags te dkyil 'khor ba// don re lnga yi dbabs dag du// brtag sa na mngon pa'i rnam mkha' shis// bar thang kha dog rnamal po// so sor ma 'dres gsal ba shas//
295a5: mtha' shin dam nyams dang // ma grub mnyam por gnas pa la// rba chos la bar med// de ltar btags pas las bya'o// sang ba kya ba'i gdab da do// gzhan rje dag pa'i bdud rjes dang // sen po ngas pa'i pa rdo rjes dang //
295a6: gdong ldan kyim rjeb dang / ma po rngam pa 'thang rjes dang // 'aglang po rku ba'i 'ji las dang // gdag pa klu'i rngan grang dang // skyon can rna ba'i las grang dang // zhang blar gdug pa'i dregs dang // kha nas mtho ba 'dun sa dang // gnyen 'grel pa yi gnas
295a7: rnams / hra sa gangag par du 'os bas// lul 'argyas 'gas chen po sa sa// lo sa bzhugs te rabatu spang zhes gsungs so// des 'danas bas pa' las te// de sa bsdang pa las rnams kyang // mang dang mi mngon pa
295a8: la/ cod pa nye bar 'i bya byar// ser sna spang ba'i sems kyis ni// rin dang bden pas bsgom pa bslad/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di gzung ba ste// de nas slob dpon bdag nyid kyis// rdo rje dral bur ldan pa sa yi// rtse gsung
295b1: 'gros kyis kun tu bzod / / khres pas hA gi brtul bya/ dngos grub bar du gcod pa'i bgegs// dengs shig ces su bsgonas kyang // seng lde pung bu sor brgyad pa// khro sor shin brlabs gdab par bya gsungs so// de la 'di ni
295b2: pa'i lha mo spyan drang ba'o/ / de nas dbang gyur l+h+wam de// phan drangs bskyed dang gnyis rin pa pa// mchod bstod dus bzhin byas dpar// bdag cag rnal 'byor grib pa'o// dag tus mngon par rdzogs pa'i ma/ dungatra tshogs kyis rtsol ba
295b3: dgyes pa'i las kyi don bgrangs te/ / bdag cags la bzod pa' che// ra dra'i rgol ba 'byung ba na// spyad ldan de la dbang // zhes gsungs pa// de la 'di ni btags brtag pa'o// mtshan mapa mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir//
295b4: lnga mtshan nyid brtag par bya// dge ba'i rtags na dngos grub 'gang // gal te shes par mi gyur na// thibs la mkhas pas snang bar bya// yang na sbyin sreg bya bar brtag ces gsungs so// de la 'di ni rin chen gter sra ba'i gan
295b5: bsod nams gter ldan phyir/ ngan chen lnga dang sman lnga dang / spos lnga 'bru lnga snying po lnga// ga'u'i nang du thugs nas su// sa gzhi gangar dang ldan par bzhos gsungs so// de la 'di ni sa khyad pa'o// sa zhig spos chen rnam lnga yis// khu
295b6: bres nas kun tu ni/ gru bzhi dbyibs su legs byas te// ba ko tsam du brgyad nul bya// de nas dkyil 'khor lha tshogs kyis// sngags dang phyag rgyas gyung bar bya// des kyang dngos po kun sbyangs te// rgyal ba'i thugs gnas rang bzhin du/
295b7: ting nge 'dzir byas sbyang ba dag nas gsungs so// de la 'di na sa/ god la gnas pa'i tshi ga'o// de nas lha rnams ji snyed pa// rang ba'i dkun rdzob spyan drangs te// spos kyi dkyil 'khor lha grangs bzhin// gdan sar byas te yod parjod
295b8: la/ lan gcig gshegs shes sta god bya// de nas 'dus pa'i sems can kun// gsang dang snying kar bram pa dang // ku sha brim dang srung skud gdags// so shing brim dang rmi rtas brtag/ mchod pa'i yo byad ji snyed dang // h+yad
296a1: #/ / 'os pa'i rnam pa kur / tshangs par bsags te byin gyis brdab// 'dus pa'i sems can de dag kun// chos gtam rim pas dbugs phyung ste// gsang sngags pa'i yon tan bshad ces gsungs so// de la 'di na dkyil
296a2: 'khor bri ba'i dus so/ / dag byed dag ga yan lag las// dus rnams shes par bya ba de// bkra shes pa yi nyi ma dang // 'byor ldan dus tsha ba bzang ba ni// mtshan ma'i rtog pa yin mod kyang // brtags na dngos grub mtshan ma 'asrung zhes
296a3: gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i cho ga'o// tshon dang thig skad nam lnga la// sangs rgyas lnga yis byin brlabs te// sprul pa 'phro 'du rgyan mi gcad// sum sa pa gyi phog dkar po yi// dud pas rgyan mi gcad par 'dug/ khros pas
296a4: drag po'i sngags zlos shing / / khro ba khra me'i stangs kyis bskor// bde bar gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskal// thig skud sa pa pa gtsang ma'am// gsang ba'i ltung lo 'khril mdangs sam// rdo rje hud theg la sogs la// yam gyi grangs dang
296a5: mthun par bsgom/ / rdo rje rtse lnga'i lug rgud// byang chub sems su byin gyis brlab// theg g.yog las kyi sems pa ste// mtshan ldan byin gyis brlabs nas ni// phyag rgya gang dang bcas pa yis// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ban ma
296a6: gdab/ de nas sa thig gdab pa yang // 'dul ba'i dbang gi bye khrag las// paN Da la tshad ma nges pa med// sor bzhi pa nas brtsams nas su// ji srid dpag tshad thub par ro// oM dza na tsakra sa tra pa ti kra ma hA zhes gsungs so//
296a7: 'dasadzin dgye ba'i 'og 'o// rang bzhi dkan rjebaci 'dra dang // ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor de 'dra bar// brnyan ma yid ni de 'dra bri// tshon sna 'bras dang 'brang khungs sam// rdo 'ams rin chen dgal bya// lnga dag ngan
296a8: tan phung po'o zhen gyis ni/ / dbus kyi pho brang bskor ba yin// sgrol rnam lngas bskor bar bya// phyag rgya gzhan la brkyang bas so// da// radam ser ljang nag pa rnams// ga rams de yis bkod par bya// gtso pa ga/ zugs
296b1: rdzogs par bri/ / 'khor rnams phyag rgya dag tu bya// phal ba dag la yig 'bras so// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di'i dkyil 'khor gyis rgyan dgod pa'i cho ga'o// de nas brtag pa'i dbus 'khob la// za rnam pa tshan 'phen dang gdug
296b2: po bang gling bu brdab pa dang / / rdza rnga mra kun ji dzin dang // da rdar dang lun dang // tha dad dbangs dang bshad pa / rol la ma byang ji snyed pas// dga' byed dkyil 'khor dag la brtan bam parnam pa ga sa// gser da da
296b3: las byas pa'o/ / rigs dang mthun pa'i gos kyis bkris// be tog 'bras bu brtan pa la// bdud rtsi lnga yis gang byas pa// sman dang rin chen 'thun pa ldan// gang babartang dpa bcu drug pa'ag/ ky-i pa nga bdag pos mngon bsngags
296b4: nas rgyal bum pa de bzhin du/ / dbus nyid pa ni bzhag par bya// yang na bus par min par ro// za ba nyi ma drin dang // brtad pa rab tu snyam pa dang // dbang po kun das 'bang ba rnabs pa sha srang gcig gis rab bzlas pas// ga
296b5: sasan de bzhin gzhag/ zad du byung ba'i gtor ba dgra la// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ ci rigs rnams kyis mdzes par bya// zhes gsungasas so la 'di bdag na 'phen ba sda kyis las sngar bstan pa'o//
296b6: sngags pa mnyam bdag ste// ting 'dzin 'akyil 'khar gsal bar bsgo ba// gsal ba gnyis med dkyil 'khor du// rang bzhin kun rdzob snyan drangs dang // dbab dang bzhugs dang brtan pa dang // mi g.ya ma ma gzis
296b7: la la mi med pa brjod pa dang / / gsang bar chog gi dkyil 'khor dang // 'jug dang dang ma grub gsol ba dang / dbang bskur pa yi ba las rnams byas// des na tshe 'di nyid la yang / sangs rgyas dad kyang theb 'gyur na
296b8: gzhan lta dgas shes gsungs so/ / // 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po/ ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khar yi mdo zhes bya ba las gzugs banan gyi dkyil 'khor ram par phye bar pa'u sku bdun pa'o
297a1: ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po de cos thams cad ldan gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya las mi 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas phyag ca ma'i gagi satshan nyid rnams nyid kyi sku dang gsu/ dang thugs rdo rje las phung ngo /
297a2: / gsang sngags cha mtshoman po 'di// phyag chubs pa yas ji snyed pa// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhi ru 'dus// dang por phyag tu chen po ste// gnyis pa dam chog tu yin no// gsum pa chos kyi phyag rgya ste//
297a3: bzhi pa las kyi phrag rgya ste// phyag rgya chen po sa6// rang bzhin chos su dngo// med u0f7f// gzugs su mtshan mo'i rgya shes bshad// gzugs sku rang bzhin kur rdzong dang // bsgob dang pa skyed pa yin par bshad// gnyis pa'i
297a4: rgyal gsum yod de/ / bsgos dang gzung dang bcing ba'o// bsgos pa dam tshig gsung yin te// gsal ldan ma'am byin brlab pa'o// gzung ba thugs mtshan nyid bzad pa'o// dam tshig lag rgyabacing bar bshad// yang na so so'i
297a5: gtse/ bu rnams// sbyor thabs phyag tu nyid yin no// gsum pa'i rgyal gsum yod de// rang bzhin bsgom dang bzlas brjod do// rang bzhin chos kyi mab d+ha ni// chos kyi dbyings su rgyal bas gsung sa// bsgom pa mtshan ma'i
297a6: yig 'bra dag/ lce stong snying kha mkha' sogs su// maran pa'i rnam par gsal ba'o// srab bskyed dang bzlab pa yis// snying po tshig brjod rnas// bzhi pa las kyi phyag rgyal// rnam pa gsum du dag pos gsungs/
297a7: 'a bcing ba'o// las kyi lha yin la 'byor gang // bkros pasgom pa las kyi rtsa// sa 'og mkha' 'am thugs 'anasarnam ba' las kyis 'phro 'du ni// 'phrol lasa'i phyag tu'o// phyag rgya bca' dang spangs tshul rnams//
297a8: ba las kyi phyag tu bshad// lag bcad pa rig phyag rgyan mas// rang gi sku phurna mas snyoms nas// bcings gang mkha' la rnam grol na// sdig pa kun las rnam grol zhing // sangs rgyas nyid kyang 'thob 'gyur ra// dngos
297b1: grub gzhan lta spos cis dgos/ / bdag nyid phyag rgya cher bsgom pa// dbu ni rnam par snang mdzad de// lag g.yas rdo rje sems pa'i rgya// lag g.yon rin chen 'byung ldan rgya// rkang pa g.yon pa snad mtha' yas// rkang ga phra
297b2: las kyi mas dpa'i rtsa/ / yan lag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bas// bskul bskyod tham mi cad phyag rgya yin// song mo rnams la bsgom byab// gang po gnyis la oM dang li// 'dzub so gnas pa hU~M dang suM// dbang po gnyis la
297b3: dang laM/ rlung ngu gnyis la oM dang paM// sbom po gnyis la hi dang traM// g.yas pa'i 'brug ngan nyi ma ste// g.yon pa zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// l-i rang mu du rtse sbyar ste// de bzhin hU~M dang la du sbyad// dad pa yang de bzhi dang// maM dang taM du sbyar ba la// rgya
297b4: sbyar sa dang sa basbed pa/ / 'di ni yab kyi ste rba yid// lag pa thal mo sbyang ba las// e dang sa hA da ni// la sbyar sa dad pa du k+sha // dang me stA ra~M taM bskyed// yul gyi d+ha yan par bshad // rdo rje khu tshur snying 'ang/
297b5: bcang// oM bsted rtse mong 'khor lo 'bar// rin chen 'dril bsil chos la bstan// 'dzus pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rnam par snang mdzad phyag rgya yin// rin chen bu tshur snying khar bcangs// la~M basbrang rtsol
297b6: drig la 'phar/ / rdo rje thal ro las la 'thil// 'dzum pa'i mad sa dang bcas pa ni// de gshegs dbyings phyug ma ya~M u0f7f// rdo rje'u tshur snyi khar bstan// hUM bsgreng rtsel rdo rje bar// rin chen drilasil chos la brtan/
297b7: 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje sems pa'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen khu chur snyid khar brtan// muM bsgred rtsel dril gsol 'bar// rdo rje thar mo las la 'bral// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rdo rje dbyings
297b8: phyug phyag rgya yin/ / rdo rje khu tshur snying khang brtan// sra bsgreng rtsel rin chen 'bar// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs dang bcas pa ni// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen khu tshur snying
298a1: khang btan/ mi bsgreng rtsal dril gsil 'bar/ rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mngangs dang bcas pa ni// rin chen dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// rdo rje 'u chung snying bar brtan a bsgreng rtsa la pad mo 'bar/ 'a che/
298a2: dril ga la chos la tam/ 'dzud pa'i mad pa nga bcas pa ni// snang ba mtha' yas phyag rgya yin// rin can 'dung shing 'ang brtan/ paM bsdeng rtse la dril gsil 'bar/ rdo rje thal mo las la 'bri 'dzum pa'i rangs dang bcas pa'i
298a3: ma dbyings phrag phyag tu yin/ / rdo rje khu tshur snying khar btan// haM bskrang rtse la ral grel 'bar// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mngangs dang bcas pa ni/ don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya yin// rin chen khu tshur snying khar
298a4: btang / / bslang rtsol dril ka la 'bar// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdas dang bcas pa ni// las kyi dbyings phyug phyag rgya yin// rdo rje khu rdur thugs kan/ rin chen dril gsel chos la btan/ 'jum pa'i
298a5: mdangs kyis / / rdzoba'i rgya yin// rin chen gar thabs bskor nas su// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khrul// 'dzum pa'i mngangs kyis 'dud pa'i tshul// gar gyi phyag rgyar dpa' bos bshad // rdo rje thugs par rin chen
298a6: 'jig rin chen rdul pa/ / 'dzum pa'i mngangs kyi ba ni// sa'i snying po'i phyag rgya yin// rdorjekhu tshur bcangs pa ni// sku yi thang kar 'dzin pa dang // 'dzums pa'i rlangs kyis 'du ba ni// sreg mo'i
298a7: yin par bcad/ rdo rje ral mi thugs pan// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzum pa'i mngangs kyis lwa ba ni/ nam mkha'i snying po'i phyag cha yin// rnga rje rin chen rna lag gnas/ rin chen phreng ba bzung nas su 'dzum pa'i
298a8: mdas kyis 'dud pa ni/ / phreng ba'i phyag rgya yin par grags// rdo rje pad ma thugs kha na// rin chen dril gsil chos la bstan// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta ba ni// sman ras gzigs kyi phyag rgya yin// rin chen po pang 'dzin pa la/
298b1: rdo rje len par byas napa ni/ 'dzub pa'i mdangs kyis 'dud pa ni// dbyangs kyis phyag tu yin par grags// rdo rje kla shing shugs la na// rin chen dril gsil chos la brtan// 'dzub pa'i gdangs kyis lta ba yin// bams pa me tri'i phyag rgya yin/
298b2: rin chen bdus ma kha / las la rab tu 'phral/ 'dzum pa'i med pa sa 'dud pa na// badreg pa'i phyag rgya yin par bshad mthugs ka 'dzin// de e jal gsil chos la pa// / 'jam pa'i mangs kyis
298b3: ba ni/ / sgrib pa can la kha ye na ltag tu// ma dog sdad bcas 'dzin pa la// 'jub pa'i 'dadas kyis 'dung ba ni// me tog phyag tu yin par bshad// rdo rje ud pal thugs khan// rir re dri la gas la chos la brtan/ 'jam
298b4: pa'i mangs sa na 'jam dpa' mnas / rin chen mar ma thugs khan// rdo rje thal mo las la 'khril// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyi 'dud pa ni// mar ma'i bag rgyar dpa' bos shang // rdo rje snying mthugs ka na// rin chen dri la gsal
298b5: chos la brtan/ 'a mad kyi ma na du bzang ba'i phyag tu yod// rin chen dbyug pa thug sa kan// rdo rje thal po las la 'khril// rdo rje thug par byed pa no// de yi phyag rgya yin par bshas 'dir ro rengs ka gshed po'i rtsa/
298b6: gnon pa stobs pa che// zong kA la gnod pa na yin// rgyab la gzhon pa bdud rtsi 'khril// 'ju ba gnyis mtha ba lpags pa'im// 'jub gnyis rtse spang shigs pa'i rgya// 'dzu ba gnyis 'khyud pa la ku rdu bstod par gyur ba 'bebs pa'o//
298b7: na/ kyang la/ 'am tog na ladags / me drag sa na
298b8: bang mo bayan gsum gyis/ g.yu bshad// bde gshegs rnams 'jugs dpal lo// sems dpa' rnams la sabs dpa di/ 'ad dang thub pa bcing des
299a1: 'phags brdung brgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid bshad pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas smra ba'i seng ge byed pa po rdo rje kun tu bzang pos 'di skad ces gsol to//
299a2: bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog ga bdag po he ru ka rnams kyi dkyil 'khor ji bu lags pa bdag cag rnams la bshad du gsol// gas ba mchog gi bdag pos bshang du gsol zhes gsol ba btab pa las/ bcom ldan 'das
299a3: gsang ba mchog gi ma bdag po des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo rnam par 'phro ba'i rgyal po ye shes rngam pa klog zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ nyid kyi sku khro bo chen por 'du mdzad de// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig
299a4: rten na dregs pa chen po la sogs pa gdug pa'i dbang du 'gro ba rnams gyur te/ khams gsum 'di na/ de bzhin gshegs pa gsung rab ze bar ston pa dang // 'jug pa dang bstan pa la gnas shing dkon mchog gsum la 'jug pa ni 'ga' yang
299a5: yang / ltos pas gtum pa rab ku gdug pa'i sems dang // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis bsgribs pa gtum zhing 'khrug pa dang / gzhan gyi srog dang sems 'phrog pa dang / mi dge bcu'i las kyis nyon mongs pa dang nye ba'i nyon mongs pas
299a6: gas pa dang / gcag shagacag gas za ba dang / lag pa'i lam la gnas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po 'di brlag go zhes sngon gyi smon lam la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / gsang ba mchog gi bdag po chen po
299a7: par gzug sanas nyid kas dang gsung thugs rdo rje las khro ba'i dkyil 'khor klog rnas par 'phro ba 'di byung ngo / / oM badz+ra ma hA tsa/ Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka hA na ta ba tsa/ bi shwa kro d+ha dza ma rka Da la/ phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la/ 'di blang ma thag
299a8: chen po'i mthas khams gsum 'di dag thams cad g.yos so/ / rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yes so// 'ur 'ur rab tu'ur 'ur/ kun du rab ku'ur 'ur// shig shig/ rab tu shig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig go// gtor gtor/ rab tu
299b1: kun du rab tu ga ngar gtor ro/ / lnga dang k+Sha dang / gnod ston dang dri za dang / nam mkha'i lding dang / srin po la sogs pa rnams 'khrugs pa chen por gyur to// de nas 'jigs pas ngan pa de dag brgya byin la skyabs su so// brgya byin
299b2: yang 'jigs pas nyan te tshangs pa'i thang pa byar/ rangs pa yang khyab 'jug zad du song // khab 'jug kyang dbang phyug chen po'i thang pa song // dbang phyug chen po rang gi mtha yod do/ son cing ldarnams pa skrag/ kla rnams dang /
299b3: gsod sbyin rnamapag rnam yin dang / 'khor du rtags pa rnams ma skrag shig/ nga'i mthu 'di la gzhan gang gis kyang // brdzi bar mnus so zhes spru sa so// ka ba ta byar dang tshangs pa dang / lnga pa 'jug rnangs khyed kya
299b4: 'jig rten na mthu che ba'i chen po yin pas rang rang gi mthu dang rdza 'bral ci yod pas rang rang ga 'khor gdug pa de dag dbug pa byung bar mdza gas bsgo'o/ / de nas rgya bin dang tshangs pa dang / khyab 'jug rnams dam
299b5: thag tu rang rang gi satha ci yod pa ston cing rdo rje'i skad dang gang mo drag po 'byin cing dngang gi 'khor rnams la ma skrag pa dngangs shig/ bdag cag gi mthu 'di lta bu gzhan gang gis kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so// zhes
299b6: song ngo / / de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po des de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas yus rngam pa'i kre d+ha'i rgyal po mngon par blang ste/ hi ho dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyi rol ba'i dgyes pas thos par 'dzad
299b7: nas/ byang chub sems kyi srin las phaT phaT badz+ra kro d+ha dza la maN Da la ha la ha la zhes pas stong gsum khro bo tshal bra gang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dkris pa chen po 'di ni dbu dgu phyag bcwa brta na
299b8: rnam pa brgyad kyi rnam par snang ngo / de nas bgyes te hA dA ni zhes brjod pas dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad las 'dul ba'i dbang gis dbu gsum phyag du gzhabs bzhir gyur te/ khrag gi rgyal tsho 'khrug pa'i dkyil na
300a1: rus kyi ster na rnam par gnas so/ / khro bo tshol ba de dag gis kyang phyogs bcu'i dregs pa ji snyed pa kun bsgral te slar 'dus nas// la la ni las kyi khrag 'thung chen por gyur nas/ brgya byin 'khor dang bcas pa
300a2: bsgral/ la la ni rin chen khrag mthung du gyur te// tshangs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la ni pad ma khrag 'thung chen por gyur to// ma nA de ba 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ la la no las kyi khrag 'thung chen por gyur te/
300a3: khyab 'jug 'khor dang bcas pa bsgral/ khro ba de dag gis dregs pa can de dag gis ngan grol kun drang sa// khrag 'thus rus pa kan 'chos so// de nas dgyes te oM ru lu ru lu dza dza zhes brjod pas// dbang phyug chen po bcu
300a4: gnyis dang brgyad kyis 'khor tshogs ma lus pa yud tsam gcig gis dbang du 'dus par gyur pa ni dper na rdo khab len la lcags 'du ba'i tshul lo/ / bcom ldan 'das dpal chen po'i skul rnam pa brgyad kyis 'khril
300a5: pa'i rdolda du gnas so/ / lag 'thang ba'i la rnam pa lnga lngas 'khril pa'i tshul gyis rnam par gnas pa dang / dgyes te ha ta zhes brjod pas byang chub sems las dkar mo'i tshogs dang // rkun mo'i tshogs dang /
300a6: lbos me'i tshogs dang / gtul mo'i tshogs dang / rmongs me'i tshigs dang / thal byed ma'i tshogs dang // sme sha can gyi tshogs dang // ma mi'i tshigs rnams 'thon to// de nas yang dgyes te he he zhes brjod pas byang chub sems
300a7: las ser gdong gi tshogs dang / stag gdong gi tshogs dang / wa gdong gi tshigs dang / khyi gdong gi tshogs dang / ban go dang gi tshogs dang / ngur bya'i gdong gi tshogs dang / bya rog gi gdong gi tshogs dang // 'ug pa'i gdong
300a8: gi tshogs rnams 'thon to/ / de nas yang dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas byang chub sems las rta gdong gi tshogs dang phagagadong gi tshogs dang / sed gdong gi tshogs dang / sbrul gdong gi tshogs mthon nas nyi shu rtsa rgyad 'khor dang
300b1: bcas pa rnams rang rang gi gdan ga la ba der yud tsam gyis phyin pa de phaT ces smos so/ / de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa rnams na/ drags pa gang ni med yod pa/ thams cad las ji ltar 'dul ba dang / thabs
300b2: ces 'dul ba sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis mthus 'dul bar gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis khro ba de dag la dregs pa'i tshogs gas ragasol sha ga zhes bka' stsal pas/ lba bar dag gis gsol pa/
300b3: bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis gso bar gsol zhes pa dang // bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis khro bo de dag gcig tu hUM zhes pas bsdus te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa'i tshul du rnam par gnas so// de nas ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po
300b4: des phyag bcwa brgyad bsnol te btsir bas mi gtsang ba'i 'dam chen por 'khyil to/ / de nas bdud rtsi bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs nas bdud rtsi 'byung zhes bya ba gnam nas rnam par phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma ha kro d+hi
300b5: shwa ri u spr-i dza/ badz+ra a mri ti hU a/ de nas khro mo bdad rtsi chen mo de smin ma sar zhing shin tu rngam pa'i bgad pas ru lu ru lu khA hi khA hi zhes bdud rtsi ra bsgrubs te gsol bas gdug pa can thams cad snga ma bzhin dur
300b6: rang gi lus sos par gyur te sems dran nas dpal chen ye shes rngam pa'i rgyal po'i sku dbu dgu brgya'i byaka/ steng brgyad rma/ zhabs brgyad brgyar gnas shing yab la khro bo brgya rtse brgyad lhun gyis grub par mthong ngo // 'phra men ma nyi shu tshogs
300b7: kyang shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs rang rang gi bstan dang lag char gnas par mthong nas/ / shin tu ngo ma tshar du gyur nas zhum pa'ing ngos gsol ba btab pa// bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa rnams/ rngam chen rgyal po'i 'bangs su ma chi// 'bangs su
300b8: nan tan ma bgyis na/ mgo lus snying yang rul nas ni// btse bsregs gnas su 'bod sgrogs sheka/ bdag cag rnams kyi sa dang srid// mchis brang dang ni bu mo rnams// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhes su gsol// bdag cag rnams kyi
301a1: mgo bcad la/ / 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor rgyan du bzhes// bdag cag rnams kyi snying byung la// dpal chen nyid kyi zhal du gsol// bdag cag rnams kyi lpags shus pa// dpa' bo chen po grul gsol// a la la po gas
301a2: gsol ba btab ste/ / la las di rang gi lus gdan khrir phul// las ni rang gi mgo bcad nas 'bar ba'i tshogs kyis zhal bur dbul// la las ni rang gi snying phyung nas zhal du gsol// la las ni rang gi lpags pa bshus te sku la gamang bzhir
301a3: gsol to/ / dbang phyug chen po rnams dpal chen po'i thul sngal ltar 'khril pas// des dregs pa'i tshogs rnams kyang shes bya'i slob pa byang ste// bden par thong ras dam tshig dang ldan par mthong bar gyur te/ de'i tshe 'dus pa'i
301a4: 'khor tshogs kyang rab tu spro ba'i sems kyis rdzu 'phral rnam 'dum dang ldan te/ / la la ni 'jig rten gyi khams brgyad ma ring du 'phen// la la ni ri rab gling la bskor// la la ni nyi zla zhabs 'og gnod// la la ni 'jig rten rnam
301a5: pa drug tu garo ba la sogs pa'i cho 'phral rnam pa du ma stor cing a la la zhes pa'i sgra rnam par 'byin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'jigs byed tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di nyid kyi su
301a6: dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo / / dur khrod chen po'i gnas chen du// rag ta'i rba rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil// ker rus ri rab 'bar ba'i steng // me 'bar sreg pa'i grong dkyil na// dur khrod 'bar ba'i gzhal
301a7: yas khang / / tshad dang rgya yongs ma chad pa// phyi nang med par gsal ba'i 'od// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad par khyams bzhis brgyan pa// gru bzhi sgo khyud 'bar bas mdzes// bar mabya sa gnyis
301a8: ni 'bar bar gsal/ / nyi zla sbrul dang thod pas brgyad// khyung mchog dang ni ma he gzig/ stag dang gtum thud dom dag gi/ sngar mos dregs pa brgya byin dang // tshangs pa dbang phyug bzung ba ni// gdan chen rnams kyang bzung ba'o//
301b1: dbus su 'jigs byed chen po ni// smag nag chen po'i 'jigs byed gzugs// dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de// spyan 'bar ba ni nyi shu bdud// zhabs brgyad thur du gtams pa'o// rtsub pa'i phyag sar daskal par
301b2: gas/ / rdo rje gshog pa phyogs bcur gtams// dur khrod rgyan gyis rab tu zhugs// btsun mo rngam pa kro d+hi yid// cha lugs 'jigs byed chen po ltar// de yi phyogs kyi khro ba yang // khrag 'thung rdo rje
301b3: na chen dang / / pad ma las kyi he ru ka/ kun kyang dbu gsum phyag drug ste// zhabs bzhi dag tu rnam par bzad// kro d+ha'i tshogs kyis rab tu 'khril// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i rtse mtshan la// dkar mo la sogs
301b4: ral pa can/ / rang bstan lag char chas te gnas// phyi rol shar gyi phyogs de gnas// seng gdong la sogs mgo brnyan tshogs// bstan dang lag cha de bzhin chas// sgo zungs gdong mo la sogs gnas// 8
301b5: gi lag mtshan bstan dang chas/ / 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis pa la// rdo rje srin po khro bo bcu// hUM chen rnam rgyal dbyug sngon can// gsher po mi g.yo rta mgrir rgyal// gzhan gyis mi thub bdud rtsi 'khyil// khams
301b6: gsum rnam rgyal stobs po che/ / de dag rnams dang gnyis med pa'i// rdo rje srin mo khro mo bcu// rlung 'byin snyems mo sder mo dang // dur khrod gtud khung gtum mo dang // mda' snyems sgra 'byin gsor ma dang // skal
301b7: byed rnams kyis rab tu 'dril/ / kun kyang zhal gsum phyag drug ste// zhabs drug rdo brag sbyangs na// 'jig rten skyong bas btud tshul lo// de dag rnams kyis bka' sdod ni// rdo rje 'phra man gsum bgacad//
301b8: mche bshog 'bar ba'i tshogs dang 'khor// sras dang byi mo bran mo dang // ci babye la sogs po nya'i tshogs// phyi rol su ngan dag la gnas// zhes gsungs pas snang srid thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du gyur to//
302a1: ldan sa 'dags kyang can pa sags ga la la tu/ ga dgas pa mas byung gsan zunas ban na da

302a5: akakas ka ka/ 6haM/ babab pa/ dz+ra dza rdzang / a rA te tsa/ ta tsa/ a mo ka/ lo ka ba sma ba lA ya/ dza hA ba tsa/ ba bab pa bab ba bab pa/ rje drwa r+tha/ zo kra wa kra kra kra rba
