303a1: krung g.yon brkyang g.yas bskum tshul/ / skabs su mchod par dpa' bos bshad// g.yas pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas bsgreng // g.yon pa 'dzin pa ltar byas pa// g.yas dang g.yon du lta zhing
303a2: snang / / go'u ri tshogs kyi phyag brgya yin// mnga' gzhu 'grengs pa'i tshul du ni// 'bri tshugs mi 'gyur la byed pa// rkun mo'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// g.yas pas khu tshur bcangs pa ni// mthe bo mthe' chung brkyang
303a3: ze byas/ gdon pas 'dzin pa'i khro rdul// / bre mo'i phyag rgya dpa' bos bshad// g.yas pa'i gung mo rtse mo brkyang // sor bzhi rtse btsus rdo rje 'char// g.yon pa dku ru brten pa ni// 'bri tshugs lta ba be ta'i rgya/ gdon
303a4: pas nyon mongs mnan tshul la/ / g.yas pas chu 'dren za ba'i tshul// bu ka'i phyag rgyar bshad pa yin// g.yon pa dung khrag 'dzin pa la// g.yas pas khrug bcing rngam tshul ston// gar+Na ri yi phyag brgya yin/
303a5: g.yon pas byis pa'i lus mnan nas// g.yas pas snying 'dren za tshul du// sgrol tshul stabs pra sha'i r+g+ha// g.yas pas mgo bcad byer nas kyang // ka min pas lus 'dzin stobs pa ltar// tsad Da li yi d+ya /
303a6: rgya/ ga gnyis brang ba de// 'anar rdzogs la gsags pa// be gdong tshogs kyi phyag u0f7f rin/ lag gnyis cang dru ba rgol nas ni// ni bre grags mcheb pasar// sngag ga nga tshogs kyi phyag
303a7: na/ lag gnyis zhing khong 'phya nas// lce'i yis lag pa ltar byed na// lwa so rdzogs kyi bya na yin// la gnyis zhing khong la skyenas// 'bri chags ba shon 'argya// lag gnyis sgra gri thobs tshul tra/
303a8: g.yon pas rna mar zang shing bya// gzhad sdong tshigs kyi phyag rgya yin// zhing chen phranas brga nis ni// keng drang thogs pa ltar byas pa// dur bya'i tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// g.yon pa b+hin d+ha g.yas pa gri/
303b1: glo snying 'dren pa ltar byed pa// khwa khram yi phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa rdo rje khu tshur la// lcags kyu 'dzin pa hA lu'i rgya// 'dzub gnyis lcags kyu'i tshul du byas// rta skad pa dzer ba ltar byas pa// rta gdong tshogs kyi
303b2: phyag rgya'i yin/ / 'jub gnyis rtse snang pag gding gis// tha rgod rlog pa'i tshul bstan pa// phag gdod tshogs kyi phyag rgya yan// 'dzub gnyis lu gu zung du 'khyud// seng ge'i tshul du ral gsogs pa// seng gdong
303b3: tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin/ / lag gnyis rab tu bskyod bya zhing // phyogs bcu lta bar byed pa ni// sbrul gdong tshogs kyi phyag rgya yin// lag pa'i phyag rgya ba cings byas shing // rkang pa 'jog tshul stabs su mdzod/
303b4: g.yas pa'i sdig 'dzub nam mkhar 'phyar// g.yon pa dkur brten pa ni// tA kar yi phyag rgya yin// lag pa g.yas pa sder mor gdengs// g.yon pa 'dzin pa rnam rgyal rgya// g.yas kyi sor mo
303b5: dbyug par brkyang / / g.yon pa gang thabs sor bar byed// dpag sngon can gyi phyag rgya yin// g.yas pa'i lu tshur nam mkhar 'phyar// g.yon pa su mo rtad ni/ gshin rje 'joms pa lub rgya yin/ ngas pa gung 'jub srin lagab rkyang /
303b6: mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan par bya// g.yon pa la'ang de bzhin shugs su bya// mi g.yo ral gri'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis mthe'u chung la gzung // lhag ma khu tshur bcangs pa las// dpral ba'i thad kar
303b7: bzung ba ni/ mchog dbul gyi phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khwa tsAr mdun du bcang ba// nags pa'i tshul du drangs pa ni// gzhan gyis mi thub phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis khu tshur gyen du bkrol/
303b8: dril bu bsil tshul bdud rtsi 'khyil// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur phyar// rdeg pa'i stabs su byas pa ni// khams gsum rnam rgyal phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis bu chur thur du brkyang // gnon pa'i
304a1: stabs su bgrang ba ri/ / stobs po che 'iyi phyag rgya yin// zad kyi dor skabs tshul du gnas// stobs su mchod pa khro ba'i rtsa/ srin mo rnams kyi phyag d+ha na// gang lag gar thabs
304a2: bskor ba yin/ / yang na khro ba'i phyag rgya las// g.yas g.yon bzlog pa yin par gsungs// ci gyad bka' nyan phyag rgya ni// g.yas g.yon sor mo drag sprugs pa'o zhes gsungs so//
304a3: 'phags pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las 'jigs byed rnams kyi phyag rgya bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag
304a4: po des bsnyen bsgrub rgan gyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / zhugs nas kyang bsnyen bslab zab mo'i dkyil 'khor 'di dag nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // bsnyen bsgrub yan lag bsam yas
304a5: kyang dkyil 'khor dag ni thams cad la/ rnal 'byor 'jug pa'i don gyi phyir// mdor bsdus rnam pa bzhir bshad do// thog mar bsnyen pa yin par bshad// gnyis pa dag ni nye bsnyen pa// gsum pa bsgrub pa
304a6: zhes su brjod/ / tha ba bsgrub chen po zhes bya// bye brag tu shes byas la// de nas las rnams brtsam par bya// bsnyen bsgrub bye brag shes bzhing // de la gnas pa rab tu gces// de dag mi shes mi gnas pa//
304a7: bsgrubs kyang 'grub par mi 'gyur te// las rnams brtsams kyang don med 'gyur // de bas dan tan bskyed dbya// bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin rab sbyor bas// byang chub sems de shes par bya// nye bar bsnyen pa la gnas pas//
304b1: sa// yang gas zugs bdag pa nyid// ga pa bskyed pa bskal byab/ pa'i ma su rgal pas gsungs// blangs dang shes pa 'breg sa las// ra
304b2: rnal 'bor gsungs/ / gang yan rdo rje 'akrab 'gyur ba// bgrub pa chen po zhes su bya// byang chub sems zhes bya ba yang // dam pa'i don gyi sems yin te// chos rnams thams cad dngos med pas
304b3: 'asor kyis sha / bsted pa'i dam tshig pan par gsungs// bdag nyid phyogs chen po ni// sngags kyi bdag po cha lugs su// ting 'dzin nan tan zhugs par bsgob// thams cad rnas
304b4: bzhi pas/ / bdag nyid ma nad de// phyag tu bzhi dang rnam ldan par// shes pa nye bsnyen dpa cig yid// rig ma bskyed bskul bya ba'o// rten du bya ba shes rab ma// mtshad ldan 'ag shis gsang ba
304b5: gzungs/ / b+ha ga gsang ba'i pad ma no// rgyal ba rnams kyi so bde ste// 'das pa'i sangs rgyas blang ba'i gnas// slad kyis byon pa gshegs pa'i shul// da ltar sangs rgyas bzhugs pa'i rten// rnal
304b6: 'bar ngol de la pa/ / matogs pa la 'khor ba la/ bsgrub pa rnams kyi bkrum pa'i tido// rnal 'byor can gyis shes chen po lnga bsdus thams cad kur// de nas yum du gnas
304b7: pa'i 'byoradabye pa bya/ / na pa'i dbus ring la gso// tshigs pa da zhabs byed// pra ba shad u dpal dang ldan dang // saM kar
304b8: gakyang ba/ rnams khrug la medag kyang gsal// snab par byed ngese bas pa // lus dra chum dkyin@// 'ong das 'tshan
305a1: pa'ang / / ska dang pa yang mdag pa'i stobs ldan pa// ya rags dang mtshan du bshad// bzhin babs dpang// mig sa ma thags rab tung pa/
305a2: shes chags gas ka// 2 zham pa dra blang ba// pad ma bar bshad// zaba'i yangs stang dag / ga kyang re// dung lus pa ra/
305a3: ltacan ma zhes bya bar grags// 'di pa la brdas // shes pa gsal la byang bzhin yangs// yum sog sangs pa bshad// sras pa'i brda' thab
305a4: pa dang na kyis dong pa med/ / denal ga la pa yang // thag dang ma na khar lci// rigs dang mtshan du bshad pa yid// swa ni mthen ze lhung ler ba
305a5: sra pa/ / ljon pa pa'i bshad par/ pra bshad la bza / nyi shu lnga yin par// yul rab tu 'dzag pa la/ gyis pa po
305a6: ra pag bzhipa yang khes/ / sngon chagasache zhing mig kyang 'ang// zab grang dang la sku ba rnams dpa'// sham dog zhe na pari // bal zhes bya bar
305a7: 'a/ la khro gnyer mang // rim can zhes bya bar bshad// migs// gcig bur 'jug pa ga gags so//
305a8: na/ pa'abrul pa// bdag sa ya sa su bshad// gzhan yang lha'am lha min nam// gang srid pas pa// ba na 'jig rten 'ams da
305b1: napa/ ba bapa pa' bananasas// mas la pas ca sa ka/ da ga sa byas pa u ga/
305b2: la bsams te/ stan du mal par bya// cad kyil lags// gas dka ma ma lte ba la// kya malas mam// yan lag pa'i ma pa' sa/ las s+ho byag/ da
305b3: gsas rnaga'i phurbanas/ / lag g.yan dril ba lcags zlog sa// zhags pa pad ma dgalal// dzarnga thabs la yab rnams bsgos// de ltar gsal ba gyur pa dang / khrag dbyangs su ma 'i gros kyang chu
305b4: dral sa/ / lhag pa yang 'den dkyil 'khor zlam// gsal ldan pa 'am byin brlabs bya'o// mtshan ldan shes rab de nyid la// 'di chen sna tshogs brgyan du gdags// gser kyin ma ga ba nga /
305b5: shas dbu daser ro// 'jam zhing gsal bar byas pa yi// chos gos lnga dang ldan par bya// a ga ru ngang du ruH// dri spos tsar ngan sbyar pa yi// khrus kyi tshe ga dag par bya// dri zhim byug pas lus la brag
305b6: dang sngags sa/ / rang yang dag pa'i lus bya'o// de nas byang chub sems pa byed de// mi dmigs don la sems sbyar phyir// skye med byang chub sems kyi don// rma cher rab tu bshad par bya// snang srid
305b7: dkyil 'khang/ par ying nas bya// de nas bsul par bya ba'i phyir// gsang pa'i badz+ra yis pas par bya// sa ma ya to nas brjod ra// sam stozhes pas bsre/ ga la
305b8: brdadar/ / ra ho ta zhes kyang // ti pa su ke zhes brjod de// gan de tsa ta zhes pas mtshon// a ti pra ho zhes brjod na// ba ti ba he zhes pas mtshon// g.yas pa smin ma bskyod na na// g.yon pa'i sngon pa da bzhin
306a1: pa tshon/ / de bzhin brda sna tshogs pas bsre// / de nas bsal bar bya ba ni// shes rab nyi ma'i 'od zer gyis// thabs mchog zla ba'i 'od zer la// bak+kul ba'i chog 'di skad do// mi g.yo ma chog gis
306a2: rgya pos dgongs su gsol/ / rnam par cog bral shar tu dra mangs// 'od zer T+Tanas 'dra ba'i radas ldan zhal// mas pa'i rol pa'i don la gshegs su gsol// thabs mchog zla ba'i 'ong bar gyis// shes rab nyi
306a3: 'od zer la/ / skal ba'i chog 'di skad do// 'byor ldan yang 'ong rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i dbya sa// shes rab zab mo rnam dag pa pa 'am ngas// rdza 'bral thabs la mkhas pa'i spyod mchog pa// 'byor lngar yid 'ong cho 'phral
306a4: tshob sngor co nye pa'i 'od zer gyis bskal ba/ / e ma'o pad ma 'bar ba'i ze'u 'bu 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bral lags na// dkris pa'i rdo rje rab gsor nas// byang chub sems smin dbab du gsol// zla ba'i 'ang
306a5: zer gyis bskal ba/ / er 'o 'od zer dga' te yid 'ong ma// sems 'phreng gdus pa'i shes rab gzung // yul 'brel ba'i pad ma la// rdo rje bde ba'i byang chub 'bar// sa la la 'o// de nas gnyis med bde mchog sems/
306a6: sangs rgyas ston gyi tshogs chen la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi mchod pa 'bral// grub pa nyi zla snying po de// rnal 'byor rdo rje chen pos blang // 'gro drug sems can bag chags sreg/ zhi ba'i mtha' la shes pa bsdad/
306a7: phyogs bcu'i rnal 'byor thags dam bskal// de ltar bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bsgrub pa yin par rgyal bas gsungs// de dag dngos grub thob pa'i rgyu// rig pa'i dam tshig bsgoms pa'i lam// sngags kyi bdag po bdag
306a8: 'grub ste/ / gang yin sa la 'jug nges pa'i// dam tshig srab po'i chen po yin// zhes gsungs so// 'phags pa rgyud kyi rgyal po ye shes rngam pa glog gi 'khor lo'i mdo zhes bya ba las bsnyen bsgrub pa rnam bzhi bshad pa'i
306b1: le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba mchog gi bdag po des 'dod pa thams cad rab tu bsgrub pa'i sbyin bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rtoms par zhugs nas// sgrub pa'i mtshan
306b2: nyid las dngos grub kyi be bag 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las byung ngo / / de la 'di ni phra mo'i ting nge 'dzin la bslab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// thams cad mkhyen pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/
306b3: sems shin tu sbyangs pas na// phra mo'i dnga'i grub bslab pa gces// rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag du// bdag nyid nam mkha' dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'o// rang gi b+ha ra ne rang bsgoms nas/
306b4: mo'i sbyor ba kur tu brtsams// rin chen rgyu las grub pa yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin du// so so'i gsung gi yig 'bru rnams// che chung yungs kar 'bachod tsam// snying kha'i dkyil du gsal ba las
306b5: tAM gi saM khong du drangs nas ni/ / khong nas kho ru byung bar bsam// hU~M ki dbugs la zhon nas su// snga yi rtse mor byung ba dang // sna rtse nyid du gsal bar bsgom// ti 'dzin gsal bar khugs pa dang // sna yi rtse nas dam
306b6: mkha' la/ / rdo ri de ring phaT kyis spro// ring du spro ba goms pa dang // 'od dang bcas pa'i yig 'bru des// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi// gsung gi yi ge ji snyed pa// dbyar gyi sprin srang 'dus pa bzhin// hUM
306b7: gas sang kha nyid du bsdu/ / yangs kar 'bri tshe dang 'ang la// stong gsum 'jig rten kar brlaka kyang // de yi nang dus le gsal// sngags kyis brtags pa'i lha rnams kyis// gnas su'ang de nyid gsal bsgom// 8
306b8: 'i 'gro yang dang yang / ci nas ngag tu ba// da ni gsung gi phra mar bshad/ gsung ga yig 'bru las// phyag mtshan nyungs kar tsam du gsal// snang la nyid du gsal ba nas// rgyal ba'i bo
307a1: brang 'alu / / gong pa'ig rims de yis bya// de ni grags kyi por bshang// so so'i thugs mtshan gsal las// rang rang lha yi rnam par gsapa// thugs dkar yungs kar 'bru chod cam/
307a2: gong ma'i tshul bya bar bshang// de na sa ye pra mo yin// de ltar lha tshogs ma lus par// rims kyis yang na cig char ro// gcig chang bsgom pa shin tu dka'// bde gshegs rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi// thams
307a3: cad mkhyen pa'i spyod yul yid/ / rnal 'bor can gyis las kyis ni// gtso nas 'khor gyi bar dag tu// yang nas yang du gsal bar bsgom// 'di dag bsgoms pa'i yon tan ni// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par
307a4: thams cad mkhyen par bsgrub pa'i mchog gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor kun/ / 'di las 'byung bar gdon mi za// 'di thos dngos grub gzhan rnams kun// bsgrub me dgos par grub pa yin// rnal 'byor can
307a5: gyis bsgom byas nas/ / ze bdag gas nges par 'grub// zas su bshang gci za ba 'am// sha rnams zos na 'grub pa yin zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje mi snang ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so// dgon pa'i gnas sam
307a6: bor ba/ / / me tog 'bras bu rgas pa da// rang gi lus ngag sems rdo rje'aM// snying khar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// 'jam dpal sa benam du skol// bdag las dang ni zla ba dang // mu rnams rim par rden la// stong pa nyid kyi
307a7: rnam pa las/ / snying rje ma dang klas pa las// rdo rje 'jam pa'i phyag rgya sgom// lus dang ngag sems rdo rje las// rdo rje 'jam pa rab 'gros dus// 'jam dpal nyid dang 'dra bar 'gyur// dpag tshad brgya yi khyon nas ru// rdo rje 'jam
307a8: da dang bcas/ / tan rnams kun gyis legs brgyan pa'i// 'jam dpa' nyid du kun gyis mthong // mngon shes ldan pa'i lha rnams kyis// lus kyi rnam pa mthong mi 'gyur// de nas slar ni bsdus pa las/
307b1: gas gi'i ma la brimapa bas na khachos shes brdab dang / malen bkun kya nga gsor 'a // thangs pa rayin pa'ang po ba 'byu / 'jug rten shes bya smos shos// zhes pasas dpa' rdzo ga 'dzigapa sas so// dam
307b2: mkha' dbyings kyi dbus dag / / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bas pas nas su// rang nyid gang 'dad ldar bsams te// mug par thugs su kyin brlabs pa'i// ngam dzes bdud ni rnam lnga la// sram matsam gyi sa lA sa// lcags gas mga' nga gtuganas ni/
307b3: nga bcug ra ga slong po las// rab tu goms par 'ang byas ma// gang 'di dag 'dzi gan ses// mtha' pas gang 'ams thams cad kyi// dul snyed bzhugs pa'as sa sas 'drang bar 'gyung // delas sogasas mtha'
307b4: parog/ ces gsungs so// yang na rang gipag pa ste// dam pa'a' dbangs kyang bas ngag tu// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor steng du ra// bdag nyid gang 'dod ldar ba sgoms te// rang gi sa ga pa ngan mang ba// lag tu thogs la dang rigs sngags/
307b5: bzlas na rig 'dzin gang yin 'gyur// rang gi lha ni gang yin pa'i// yon tan dag ni de thob 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'dir rdo rje lnga dang lha mo dgras pa'o// bang cag dag dam pa'i mdo 'am// mtshan ma gcig
307b6: gnas su/ bdag nyid gtso bzung ldan byas nas// pa gsang thugs kyi bdag nyid bsam// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje las// lag na myo ba thogs pa yi// sprul pa bsam pas 'phro bar bya// dza yA rdzapa/
307b7: 'amabud med dam/ la dung gis btegs pa sams te// kyebs gangan nam snying gnas// bzung ste sngags bsdus byas na// sangs rgyas thags pa chen po yang // rang dang me par 'gas 'thung na// jag na
307b8: dko/ / gang 'dod las de byed par 'gyur // zhes gsungs so// de ni 'di ni rdo rje lce bsgrub pa'i thabs so// bdag 'di sngags kyi skyes bu yi// rdo rje srur ni rab bskoras la// lce la pad ma'i dkyil sa du/ ga dpas so
308a1: de las rdo rje gtung ngu gar/ / bsapa yas aM gi 'gro 'dra las// sangs rgyas gsung dang sems can dag/ bdag gi lce la 'das pa ru// yang nas yang dgoms par bsdus// 'jig rten tshig gas chos
308a2: kyi sgra dag/ brjod bden zhing nyan pa dang // 'an dang phra ma tshig rtsub sogs// dag gis nyes pa ni brjod kyang // lce ba sgrib spangs par gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni sha rnam pa lnga'i dngos grub bsgrub pa'i
308a3: thabs so/ / bdag nyid lus ngag sems rdo rje// rdo rje gsum du rnam par bsgom// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// ye shes dam tshig snang khar sgo// dab can rdo rje gsal bar bya// sha chen dag ni thams cad le/
308a4: sa bon oM kyis rnam par spyad// srid gsum sems can thams cad kyi// sha chen ji snyed yod pa kun// oM gyis 'phro 'das bsdus nas ni// nged tshe bdag la thom par bsgo ba// glang po dag sha rnams la/
308a5: haM lce'i dam tshig rdo rje la// rdo rje can gyis hA du bsgom// ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// zos na dam tshig sku gsung thugs// rdo rje thob par gdon me za// bag na rdo rje'i methu stobs grub// cho ga go mas de yis ni// glang po dag
308a6: gsharnangs la/ / zhi ge 'phro 'dus rab spangs te// zos na mngon shes lha tho ba 'gyur// rta sha dag ni thams cad laM// swa'i 'phro 'dus rab spangs te// zos na me snang kun gyi mchog/ kye sha dag ni thams cad pa 'phro 'dus
308a7: ba rab 'brang zab san/ / deng bzhin nor blta bar 'gyur// gshed kyid dpa yang mod la 'jams// gang shan mas cad la/ oM 'bre'adus kyang byas pa/ chog 'di dgos na ni// sangs
308a8: khrig can ku gyi bu ma ra/ / spyod par 'gyur ba gdon ma za// nas gsungs so// de la 'di na rdo rje mngon par shes pa lnga bsgrub pa'i thabs sa// rar tu dben pa'i gnas ga tu/ bdag
308b1: rnam pa kun ldan pa'i/ / sngags kyi lus su rnam sbyangs nas// mig gi dbang po thams cad la// yig 'bru lnga las rab sbyangs te// 'od zer snga na 'phro ba las// sangs cad kyi/ rig gi mngon shes kun bsdus
308b2: nas/ / dbang po de la thim pa dang // zos sam mig la brtag bskul na// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// spyod yul ji snyed yod pa kum/ shing thog lag tu bdab pa bas// rdo rje mig gi gsal bar mthong // cho ga gong ma'i
308b3: tshul gyis ni/ / ra ba'i dbang po thams cad la// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// rna ba'i mngon shes kun bsdus nas// zos sam rnab rang bzhag ma sems can thams cad kye// sgra rnams thams cad ji skad pa/
308b4: na ba du du 'dod pa bzhin// snying gi bye brag thams cad la// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// dran pa'i mngon shes kun bsdus na // zos sam stong par bzhag na no// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi/
308b5: thugs dang sems kyi chung dag ni// len cing reg pa kun shes 'gyur// yum gyis mkha' las byung ba ni// rag ta dag na thams cad la// sangs rgyas sems can thams cad kyi// gnas rnams ma lus kun bsdus na
308b6: zos pal snying khar ga gan na/ / sngon gyi gnas kyi gtan chags rnams// zhag gsum lon bzhin gsal bar 'gyur// snying khar ye shes sems dpa' bsgom// phyogs bcur gnas pa'i sangs rgyas rnams// bkug na
308b7: rnam ni bar bas byas nas/ sas rgyas dag na bams pa te// deng rje 'byu thams cid bus 'a bar 'gyur bar gdo mig/ sa gsul so/ la dzin rdo rje bsrung ba bsgrub pa'i tha
308b8: sugasu thugs na rnam sgoms la/ / snying bar te zla'i dkyil 'khor las// tho ba 'od 'phreng ba yi// bsrung bar bya ba'i drug rngu rnams// pang ste med par bsams nas ni// lha rnams dag ni thams cad kyi// phyag rgya
309a1: das/ ga /
309a2: ga/ bgang / dag sa pa sa / rnam pamasas//
309a3: sa/ sa yang nyid 'dra// sa/ stong sa dag pa // gams par ya dang nga ba
309a4: darnam mas padapal ba da/ / dena'i bar ba sla rnams// phul pa'i be ba song ba byung // bdagagags rnams kyi byin bas ga/ ring langs pa bang 'gyur// nas gsungs so// ngang 'din
309a5: bslab pa thas so/ / sa rgyad pa zhi nyams dga' bar// rnam par gang sa bgos pa ni// rnams pa'i dbus su thab la// dkyil 'khang thul po bsams nas su// rnam par snang mdzad dkyil 'khor gyur/
309a6: ga pa dkyil 'khor la// da 'a tsha'i snying po bsas// de las na ma slar smos pas// mal 'a dbyings yongs su ga bar thos// mang dus da kyi thig sar pa la// dacir bdag gi lus pa dpag// bdag
309a7: bags/ pa 'tho / dod pa'i nang gang ba / sangs rgyas sa lus la// dbang su ba rab tu bcom/ gtus po 'dra/
309a8: da nga / gsus/ sa pa'i drung // dam pam / kyim pa dpa' brnas parabya// rnye 'ang la la 'ongs// gas san gyi
309b1: da mags dka kyang 'grus pas/ / 'dabyangs yongs su gang bar rtsom// de las 'ang gang bang / kha' rnams par gsal ba bas// bla rnams kya gnas bzlas pas/
309b2: rtsoms nas sa// 'dod par bya ba'i lus nang dgang // yang nas yang du 'ad byas na// bar snang ci 'dod rgyas par 'gongs// nor bu rin chen pozhin 'drar 'gyur// rigs pa phra mo sras dges// des gsungs so//
309b3: ci dbang dbacwab bsgrub pa'i thabs so// rdo rje dkyil 'a'ang byugs ni// rnam pa' 'dabyangs kya dbus sa bsapa// rje pa ma rig ga yas su bsam// med 'ang thab dkyil 'a'angal/
309b4: bsam par bya// bral ba sas dang bcas rnams kyis// mkha' dbyings thams cad ga bar smos// 'ad cings lnga 'phros pa yis// 'dod pal de dbab par bya// de nas pa bdag nyid kyis// pag nga thugs
309b5: byir bsdus na/ / sangs rgyas nyid kya yang 'dran// 'gro ba yang med smos ci dgas// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje dag po bslab pa'i thabs so// rnam 'i 'a dbyings kyi dbas su ni nyi 'i kyil 'a
309b6: du ni/ / khros pa'i ga zugs rnams bsgoms bya ste// bskal pa'i ma dpung 'bros pa las// khros pa'i rdo rje srin po dang // rnatshogs wa dang bya rog dang // brkod byi la sogs pa yi// 'phra man bsam pas mthazang pas/
309b7: dbyings gang bar bsgoms rnams// sangs rgyas kun la gnod byed na/ dngos sam yang na bsams nas kyang // mtshon mardzogs pa de dag gis// snying dang nang khrel dbang po kun// das/ de zos par rab bsgoms na// 3
309b8: rnam mchi bar nges pa ste/ / de ltar rab tu bskems na de// rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin pa yang // zla ba byed kyis 'chi 'gyur na// das kyi ga tams pa mas cad/ zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni skye 'gro 'dul ba'i phur bu sgrub kyi
310a1: thabs so/ sdig pa pyad dam gnod byed pa// rdo rje phung bus gdul bar ba// dur khrod gdas sam rkang gcig tu// 'dud rtsi 'khyil pa 'am ka li ma// gang yang rung bar gnas byas la// rdo rje phur bu rab tu bsgom//
310a2: me stag 'phro ba'i 'od 'phro bas// re rab gang bzhi'i gzugs byas la// rang gi sngags kyis gdab zar ba// de ltar rab tu ga ba byas na// 'gro dang pa 'gro thams cad kun// dul bar gyur bar gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so//
310a3: de la 'di ni gzhan gyi rigs sngags mnon pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ dbang chen dkyil 'khor bsgom nas ni// las kyi sems par bdag gnas la// g.yas na rdo rje rtse lnga bzhag
310a4: rig sngags byed pa bsams nas ni/ / las kyi rdo rje'i rkang pa dag/ de yi spri nas mnan par bsgom// rig sngags nyid kyang mnan par bsam// des ni mu stegs can dag dang // phas kyi rgol ba thams cad kun// mnan par 'gyur te the
310a5: tshom med/ / sa gsungs so// de la 'di ni gzhan gyi dpung mnan pa bslab pa'i thabs so// nam mkha' dbyings bya dbus pu ni/ nya ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// gzhan gyis mi thub khro bo che// rangam dmar ser mdog
310a6: 'dra ba/ / sha ni tu che zhing brjod pa bsgom// pha rol dmag dpung 'og dag tu// rlung dang mcho dngas skyed la// de la gnas pa'i dpung rnams kyis// steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// de steng rdo rje rgya gram gyi// steng du ri rab nas/
310a7: par bsgor// de yi steng du mnan bsams na// sangs rgyas dpung yang gnon par rus/ mi rgyal dpung la smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dgra'i dpung rmongs par bya ba bsgrub pa'i thabs so// dgra'am dpung gi gzugs brnyan dag/ bsams
310a8: sam gzugs su byas nas ni/ / rdo rje phur bu tshad ldan la// hU~M las khro ba'i skur bskyed nas// rang gi rig sngags rab zlas te/ snying khar btab par ra bsgoms nas// khros pas byas na sangs rgyas kyang // dpung yang/
310b1: myos par ga dam ze// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdul 'bying ba med pa bslab pa'i thabs so// nam mkha' dbangs kyi dbas su ni/ sngags kyi bdag po rab tu bskos/ chu la steng na thams cad du/ sa@
310b2: rgyas dag gis gtams par bsgom/ / steng das ngal gyis pa dag bar bsam// sangs pa dag nithams cad kyi// ska ba' steng du rkang pa bskam// de ltar rab tu goms pa dang // sa la 'gro bzhin nus par 'gyug/
310b3: gsungs so// de la 'di ni thogs med rang gi dngas thab snyas pa'i thabs so// nam mkha' rdo rje darnams de// zla ba'i dkal 'khar dbus gnas par// lha'i rnal 'byor bsgom par bya// 'og gi phyogs su yaM las na/
310b4: shes rab tu bteg par bsgom// da ltar rab bsgo pas de// mkha' la ba bzhin 'bra nas// kun mthod par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni nyi ma gsal bar zhes bya ba'i dngas grub sgrub pa'i thabs
310b5: gsung zags rdo rdza la/ / snying khang nyi ma 'dakyil la bar bsam/ de las 'od du 'bros pa las// phun pa'i gnas rnams gsal bar nges// zhes gsungs so// de la 'don dang bcad pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so// bdag nyid
310b6: ga zugs song la/ / sngags bu gru bzhi lham par bya// spos kyi thig le bdun pas te// ya ma las rlung bdun bskyed par ba// rlung la dgugs pa byas nas su// kham por gyis ni dag pa byas te// de snyed lam las ri rab bsgom// ri
310b7: tsal khro ba ni/ / 'brang ba dag gis mnan par bsgom// de pa ni 'jig pa'i drung rnams kyang // bcings par 'akur pa gdon ma za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'dan char pa dbab pa'i thabs so// nam mkha byis kyi dbus su ni// pad ma
310b8: 'dabam brgyad pa bsgom/ / dbus su khro ba stobs po che// 'dab ma la ni klu brgyad po// bsgoms sam yang na bris kyang rung // khro ba'i zhabs kyi mthil gas na// klu rnams rab tu mnan nas su// hUM gnyis par duka rnams kyi// snyi po spel cing gzing nas su//
311a1: rnams gnas shes sogs su// hUM zhes byab bzlas brjod pa// khro bos mnan pa'i klu rnams kyi// kha nas char bsngags bsams na// 'jig dus lha bu'i chang padang 'bab// nyes gsungs so// de la 'di
311a2: pa ser ba gcad pa'i thabs dam mkha'i dashiris kyi dbus su ma nyi sa'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / ta mchog dpal ni rnam par bsam/ nyi ma'i mdog 'dra 'od bzangs zhal/ nam mkha' khyab
311a3: par rna nga sa/ / lce ye snye / sa re 'od dang bcas pa las// ra chus gang ba'i sprin rnams kun// bskam ning lce yis blangs pa sams na// par 'thur bar gdon sa za// yang na rtse
311a4: de nyi dang / yaM las rlung sa pas sprin rnams gtor bar 'gyur// yang na ral gri'i phyagar+b+ha yis// char sprin dang ni klu yi gzugs// bcad cing dus bur gtubs pa sams/
311a5: zhes bya ba'i sdig 'dzub kyis// bsdus te dang ngo/ sngags bzlas na// 'jig pa'i cha ra te de rnams kyang // skad cig na ni med par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni bgegs bsal pa'i tha sa/
311a6: ma mkha'i dbus su ho ma yi// dbus su khro bo rnams bsgom pa/ mi g.yo mgon po'i phyag N+Da ra/ rig pa mang pos bskor ba'o// rang rig sngags dang stangs tshul gyis// hA dad paT ces rnam bsgrags ra//
311a7: khas gas ma dzegs pa thams cad kya/ rdul phran bzhin du chags par 'gyur/ zhes gsungs so// sde 'dzin chos kun brjid pa 'thabs so// kang rjes sa dang kyi zag pas// mtshanam pang du gcas par bya/
311a8: mi yi rus pa pur bu la// 'od zer can gyis sngags pazlas pa// / lan zadepa nyi shur bsngags nas ni// mig gnyis su ni gdab par bya// gzugs brnyan tshigs la phul nas ni// rdo rjeg tun shing dag gis
311b1: brda / dus rba ba mus len tsur nA ya nar ba gyan hUM phaT/ las 'di brtsam pa byas na ne// me rgod pa zlog par gdod mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni me bsad pa'i thabs so// me ni marked pa'i sa
311b2: mtha' lding rgyal po bakhyud de/ / nga zil lta bu'i kha dog la/ sal nag stong gis rab btsun pa'o/ gshog pa mkha' la gdengs pa bsgom// klu rnams dang ni sprin dag la// rdo rje tshig tu
311b3: dang rin po bal pa sa saso/ / thos nas kun dag bzur pa yi// cher byas ma yang bas dbar 'gyur/ gshog pas pa nyid bka banas su// mdzes brkos rus ni parnams brdad na
311b4: mes ga 'a rag mnas/ / oM badz+ra na ra yin// nir ba ba ya te na ba bu mo g+hi b+h+yo zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni thog bzlog pa'i thabs so// rnam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni/ bde ba rten
311b5: la ba dzin mernam par gnas/ / ston ka'i zla ba'i sa dag 'dra bri/ sems ma dang ni byams pa dang / rku srin tu mtshan zhes bya ba/ me tog rol pa zhes pa yi lha mo bzhi yi
311b6: gis rdo rje gsor/ / g.yon pa'i dril bu bkur brten pa/ phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa ste// sa las sems dpa' 'byung ba'i sprin thong zug sa gsal
311b7: las na babs pa yi/ / thogan rang bsags kyis bkro// sug ba/ pa/ ces gas so// del 'di gzhan gyi lce
311b8: ba / / la rnas de // sngags kyi bdag par bskems nas su// dab na dkyi khar ltang du ni// ma bstan smra ba'am shags krol ba'i//
312a1: gas su bris pa yi// steng du za ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rgya gram bsgoms pa yi// dbus sung rab srid par bya// de steng bdag gis man rabs pas na// mig dbang lha yang dbang
312a2: 'gyur na/ / bka sogs pa smos ci dgos// zhes gsungs so// dal 'di ni pra dbab pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so// lo grangs bcu gnyis lon pa yi// khye'u bu mo gang yang rung // batshan nyid thams cad
312a3: yongs rdzogs pa/ / dbab pa'i snod du rab tu brtag/ ting 'dzin rtsal dang ldan pas pa// gzhan gyi sa byas na dpyas par 'gyur// dang por phyi nang khrus byas te// sdig pa sbyang phyir 'dul khrims dpog/ 'od
312a4: kyi 'phro 'dus bya sa brlab/ / rkyed kyi khyad par rnams kyis brgyan// ga khar te ni bsgom par bya// spyi bo gtsug tu ta bsgom mo// a ni kha ru de bzhin te// de nas mduni gyi nam mkha' la// 'phags pa kun
312a5: ma khyen sman drangs/ / de las 'od zer bskul zhing dbab/ dz+nyA ni bskul ba'i sngags tshig ste/ gang dbab d+ho yis bskul bar bya'o// byis pa'i lus la thim par bsam// byis pa'i cing ta gzhal med
312a6: khang / / dbab pa'i lha nyir bzhugs bsams ste// lag brgya rdo rje thal mo las// sor mo phyir bsnol kha sbub la// mtheb gnyis so so'i mthal bkug pa'o// rdo rje'i tshig tu bzlas pa'i sngags// ri ge mo
312a7: zhig a ma shes/ / brjod cing rab tu bskul byas nas// 'gul ba dang ni g.yo bar 'gyur// khwa gang tsam nas lnga yis par// 'jigs skra gnas ni 'bar bar 'gyur// snying la gnas pa'i lha des ni
312a8: sras gsungs kun dang ldan pa te/ / 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// ci 'dod gtam ni smra bar 'gyur// rtogs pa thams cad bral ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' chen po yang // cho ga 'ang yis/
312b1: 'bar 'gyur na// 'jig rtad pa lta gas cad dgas// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni drag gtang ba'i thabs so// sA la na me sdug gdug cing khro// 'jigs byed dag po rab tu 'bar// drag
312b2: le gnyis pa pa can/ / sol ba rdo rjes drag gis bris// bskul ba'i yi ge snying po 'di// sAl gyi khong par rab tu bsam/ kha~M 'di'i nang mi zad 'dug/ 'jigs par byed pa rab bsgra
312b3: sngal de rab tu 'bul bar 'gyur/ / de nas zos shig ces bskul te// patshan ma nas ni zhugs nas ni// khong du song ste zos bas pa na// ngag gis gzung bar gdon miH//
312b4: sangs so// de la 'di ni dug blang ba'i thabs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// spyan ngas gzishes ni bsgom par bya// 'dog dkar
312b5: thags te/ dug can khong du zhugs pa yis// dug rnams trail 'dus nas ni// haM gis khong nas phyir pra dang // phaT byis bar sdang khams su gtor// yang na gzhan gyi 'od
312b6: des ni de ma thag du yang / / ngag rnams dbung par gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dug spong ba'i thabs so// drag can snang gang oM dkar las// 'od za
312b7: dkar bas dag skyes pas/ / oM nyid nag poras byung nas// gzhan gyi lce 'am mar na pa'am// khong du zhugs par rab bsgoms na// 'pho ba rtag tu gdon mi za// zhes gsu
312b8: so/ / de sa 'di na nye ba'i dug gso pa'i thabs so// mdze 'bras shub pol mig dang // 'bralam bu la sogs nang rnams kur/ a dkar dag gi 'phro 'dra yis// gong ma bzhin
313a1: dathA par bya/ / sngon yang ni de bzhin no// ngas de khabs las thar bar yi// rang rnams thabs cad nges par sel// zhes gsungs so// de la 'din bkres sgo pa zhi ba bslab pa' babapa sa// sa sra
313a2: phongs pa'am/ / yang rabasgrub pa 'apa gang yang drang // sbyor ba 'drin bcas par ba// rnam par snang mdzad gzugs chen po// ram mkha' byam su bslab par bya// ba na la yas 'du ba yan la la na gsams pa
313a3: bdang / las sa/ bza' pa gnas su de ribs pa// des ni bzas som sdug bsngal ma la// zhes gsungs so// dala'angananal par dag pa bsgrub pa'i thab pa bo// a ro theg pa rababs bas pa/ yul kun rnams mdzad
313a4: du bsdu pa/ de la gapas pa dang // ngos gang sa gsungs rje ma tho// ya padag stan dugags// zhes gsungs so// de la'ang ni 'jig rten pa'i lha mthu'i chernams thal ces 'aco cing chag ca ba bslab pa'i rnabs so//
313a5: dam mtha' rje sam/ dkyil 'a'ang rabs pa par/ khams gsumarnam par rgyal ba bsams/ zhes bya ba'i snying po yis// mthunarnams nangs nas su// bsdig par kyang byas nas ni/ zil gyis
313a6: gnon cid nyam par 'gyur/ / zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni lha mnan d+ha bslab pa'i thabs so// sngags kyi bdag bor bdag gnas pa'i// snang khar nyis 'dakyil 'khor la// tsub zhes bya ba'i 'phro 'di las// bdag nyid dun
313a7: d+ha gzugs bskur/ / rnam pa'amachog rnams kun ldan // kha dag dkar po rabang sgom/ 'din chos dbyings bsgrub pa swa// bud med thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// zhes gshad do// de la 'di ni dza~M bA la nar bska
313a8: krabasas/ / nam mkha' rtsal 'khor rabs do// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// snying khar rnga rtsi 'phro 'dul sa// dza b+ha la yi gzugs dag gis// bar snang khabs kun gang ba na// mdog ldan thor rmugs
313b1: nga gzugs/ / yid bzhin deng sogs pa yis/ dbul ba thams cad sel bar bsam/ 'dod pa la ni de dag dbab// des na dbul gsal ba byeng // ro
313b2: so/ / de la 'don rje a ngan pa slab pa thakhas so// shing gcig drung dpa bzhi mda' ba// ma mo'i gnas sam zhi gnas su// rdo rje adza bsgrub pa // / pa
313b3: na pa/ shA ta las blang pa la/ rum pan d+had chags pa dang // bshang gcer gtas smras nas ni// ri lu lcags gsum kyis bkres pa// gsum du byas na de nyid pa pa rgya
313b4: yin pa med do/ / btang na dngas grub grub 'gyur te// mig la nas nam yang ma med// mi snang ba dang / rkang ma tshogs dang / de la sogs pa'i dngos gru ba rnams// thob par 'gyur te pa zhes ga
313b5: dayangs pasgrub pa'i thebs so/ / dam // rta pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bad ci 'khyil pa rnam par bkra pa// dung khrod nga brag gtan pa' sang // nga sa rdzas pa la na
313b6: ye gcan paste du ba gas pa/ / de la dkyil la' sa par bsgo// dasngags rgyan tu bzlas byan pa/ dkug 'phor drag tubs la// rang ba mangs bkra' sa kyang bang /
313b7: pas bdag/ nganas 'bul bang gyur pa nga/ lhag bye bzhi yas gsum pa dang/ sngags kyi 'gro 'dunan mi gshed// de shes rab tu 'bar ba dang // 'gro ba ras drug gang yin pa// rdo rje drag tu gdab par la// rdo rje so yis gcad pazhig
313b8: drabs pa par bya/ / denas langs par gyur ba dang // na pa dag yid bskud// dpar du// las rnapas gang 'dod byed zhug// yang dag ras gos mngon nam//
314a1: mgyogs la sogs dngos grub rnams// ji ltar 'dod pa rkyen gyis bsgyur// gang 'dod pa de gdon mi za// zhes gsungs so// de la 'don rdo rje b+h+ra ma sgrub pa'i thabs so// bdag nyid lha yis rnal 'byor gyis// rde'u shing bu
314a2: klung ga las/ / ji ltar 'dod pa'i gzugs byas te/ she'u sman gyis grags naka/ rdo rje sngags kyi tshig 'di bzlas/ sharu krus na ya/ a ma sa klas sa nus// shing bra dgags gdang bya ning // ji ska 'dod pa'i gzu
314a3: su 'gyur/ / des ni sna tshogs gzugasu 'gyur// bsdu bar 'dod na spa ral bzlog/ de yang bkra drang thabs bu 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni re bsreg pa'i bsgrub thabs so// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbu su ni// bdag
314a4: nyid 'jigs byed skur bsgoms te/ ro la sngags kyis btab nas ni// dri zhim chu yis phyug par bya// zhun chen khu bar bcos pa yis// ras kyis kyang ni dkri bar bya// dbang po rnams kyi gnas dag tu// lha yi phyag
314a5: d+ha dgod par bya/ gnas dang sdong bu ri ra la/ lha rnams snying po bris pa gdags// ro ye phya ral shun pa la// 'gro drugs bon dkod gnas ni// rams kyi spyad pa'i las su bya// thab khung dkyil gang yin pa yi// phyag rgyag tu
314a6: dang mthun par dgo/ / de stengs shing brtsigs grub ni la/ kabazung ba ni ga bshegs kyi// rang khang yang thog bcas par ba// bar khang rog dag shar du bstan// yang steng sa rasas shog shog la// bris pa'i phyag rgya tshang bar bkod// bar khang glod kar phyogs bzhi nas// gzungs thag phyogs bzhir bla mar dbul// de mthar 'khor
314a7: gyi lha rnangs dgod/ / denas rdo thurgyal po yas// me yi 'phro bdu nad mi gcong / rje la kyi kar ma yis/ las kyi phreng brjogs par rol// rdo rje zla pa gcig gas ni/ ro yinyis ba bgrang zhing bshags// rdo rje gabs slong chen po yi// rdo rje mchod pa skabs su dbul// bkra shis gnas kyi smon lam ni//
314a8: skabs sam 'jug tu gdab par bya// rdo rje grangs kyi lteng 'dzin gyis// grangs gzung dkar byed bla ma dbul// sdig pa'i gnag byed gshegs shong bsag/ me lha spyan dang mchod pa bya// ba stong pa dag kyang legs
314b1: par bya/ / ro yi sgrib pa 'byongs ma 'byongs// me lha ltas mu bal bar bya// mtshan ma mi sdug byung ba na// bsreg skad cho ga rgya cher bya// de ni tshogs rnams rdzogs par 'gyur// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje thal
314b2: chen sgrub pa'i thabs so/ / de la thal ba tham sayang kun// gu gul dag pa dang sbar ba/ ri lu lpags gsum gyis dkris so// dza rje 'joms pa'i phyag rga dang // rdo rje drag pa'i sngags btab na// bar du gcod pa'i
314b3: gnyen por 'gyur/ / zhes gsungs so// de la 'din pa ni mam 'di'i bsgrub thabs so// las bzhi so so'i khyad par kye// rdzas dang la dag phyogs dang dbabs// yam shing bsreg rdzas khyab par las// dkarang
314b4: dpar ser mthang gnag las/ / shar 'o// nub byang phyogs dag tu// zlab bo le'u to bad ba zhi// gru bzhi zung brgyad 'khor lo rgyas// gru ra dga'u dbyibs blag pa dbang // gru gsum b+ha ga mngon spyod pa'o// ting
314b5: 'dzin byams dang dbabs zhi/ / snying rje dga' bsargas pa ste// dka' dang tshogs pas dbang du 'gur// btang snyoms khros pas drag por 'gyur// so so'i las kyi lha rgud pas/ sngags dang phyag rgya la sogs
314b6: dang / / grwa rgyud 'byor pas mchod par bya// zhal dgyur pa'i me 'os la/ khro bos ye shes me ruM sad/ seM sa bked du bshad bstabs te// klo yang sA 'khyil ba'i had lung du// dam rdzas bdud rtsi 'bar ba yaM
314b7: sbyang dang thob phyir bsreg par bya/ nyon phongs lnga'i dam rdzas te// ye shes lnga yi klong du dbul// phung po lnga de yob lnga/ bung ba yum lnga'i dbyings su bstims/ shes pa brgyad rim brgyad lo'o// yul
314b8: babad+ha me y-i pa sams/ na sa sus pa sasu ma pa / dbyibs deng/ bdeg la/ dbabs dang kha dog shes par bya// zhes gsung ba
315a1: de la 'di rdza bas gsang ba'o/ / par sa mtshogs pa pa'i ldar nas/ gnas dngas bzhi brtags par ni/ sa steng mtshon gyis bri bar bya/ dbus su thig pa'i le'u ro dag/ de'i mtha
315a2: 'khor lo nigs brgyad bya/ sgo ba'i sgo khyad bcas par bri// mtha' zang bskal pa'i me ri 'bar// dbus su zla gam kha spyod bri// phyogs mtshams brgyad du khro brgyad bri// 'khor lo'i bar khyams su kud la/ rang
315a3: rabasdus pa'i kha brjed gsal/ rtsibs la rang du lta ba brgya pa/ mu kAr brgyad la phyir bltas brgyad// gru tshang ba'i la na bltas po'i// sgo bzhir phyir blta bribar bya// phyirol par khyams de dag la// phyi lta rti
315a4: brdung gi/ bskal pa'i ma bya khyams la// phyir lta bcu ni bri bar bya// de la pag brgya rim par dgod// ro yi tshol stangs rnam bzhi yis// dung srod rdzas mchog sa pa btsal// ye shes sman gyis lta ba dang /
315a5: rdo rje 'gos kyis btsal ba dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs kyis rol pa dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis 'jol tshal dang / btsal nas marka Da la sgo bzhi nas// blo chen bzhi yis sbyang bar bya// shar du dug gsum 'dzum
315a6: pa'i bro/ / lhor khrag 'thung rol pa'i bro/ rab tu rta mdog zhal gyi bro// byang du gdul stong drag pa'i bres// spang bar bya ba rab tu gnas// de ras dbus su bzhag bya ste// mgo bos shar du bstan pa de'i// phung po gru
315a7: las gzhal med 'ang / da ru phyag Na'i rigs mchog bsgo pa/ so rdzas kyi gnas rnams la/ rigs kyi lhan pas rim par dkod/ bkren pas byin pabs rtags drung nas// bam de byang shAr
315a8: mtshams su bsgral/ / rdo rje thig gis btab nas kyang // rdzas rnams so so'i skos su gdab// de mtshon rnam lngas bkrol bar bya// 'khor lo'i spyi bo nyid nas bkre// rdo rjes snying kha'i phyogs nas bkra// rin chen
315b1: rab rgad lte ba nas/ / pad mas kha yi phyogs nas so// ral gris yan lag rnams nas bgro// de nas phyag rgya'i gnas rnams su// rdzas rnams go rims bzhin du dgod// dpal dang ldan pa'i snong dag la
315b2: thags dang ldan par ni/ / gsal ba'i 'od dang bcas par bkram/ rdzas kyis mdzes par brgyan par bya// smad du byung ba'i gtor ma dgam// mchod pa'i dam rdzas tshang bar bsham/ de nas rnal 'byor rar pa
315b3: bdag nyid phrag rgyar gnas pa re/ / bskyed pa ting 'dzin tshul bzhin bskyed// rang bzhin rdzogs chen spyan drangs mched// bslab pa nyams len bzlog par bya// dngos grub gsol dang dbang bskur byas// de nas ga
315b4: rogasum du/ / dang por bcad de sbyin sreg bya// bar mas mkha' 'gro tshim par bya// tha ma mi zad gter du swa// las rnams rdzogs par byas na ni// dpal chen nyid kyang 'grub 'gyur na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos
315b5: dgos/ / zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje mchog chen po bsgrub pa'i thabs so// don dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sa stengs cag phyed tshad du bya// sum rtsegs pas dang zugs bcang // phyi mtha' thod pas
315b6: bzo pa de dang ba bkod pa das bya ma dmar chen nus/ / dbus su ban d+ha mtshan ldan la/ yab yas snying po bris la bzhag/ zla gam brgyad la ma brgyad bzhag/ ma nying gnas sa rna mar 'bar// ra'agathod tshar gsum du bya
315b7: sgo bams dang khod rdzas kyis rgyan/ / sgo rtsag sgo khyar tham za// gnas pa dag rab dben pa yi// ri yi rtse 'am nags tshal lam// sde dpung phra mas mi chags shing // 'du 'dzi 'gra 'od chad par shis// rna
315b8: byang sde dang rab ldan zhing / / brjid cing sran tshugs pa 'phrig dang // bdal 'ag rtog pa med// las kyi 'phre ba lhag chad med// dri zhim sman gyis phyi bkra zhing // shin d+ha dus dang yang bkra// tshad mar sbya
316a1: dag dang / / ldan pas dus btab bzhin du brtsam// rtswa yid brtag par bya ba // mdzes shing bkra shis ldan pa la// bod bong lon daral bal/ rigs lnga'i mtshan rtags yod pa
316a2: rgyu mchog de lta bu/ / dag pa gsum gyis gzhung ba srang nas// na gyis brlab pa rab tu bya// d+ha hu ma 'das dbang po bsgyur// bdud rtsi lnga yi thig le yis// dbang po lnga la gdab par bya// snang
316a3: taman dri ba 'am/ / legs nyes dri ba'i bri yang dbab// rna pa shes 'byung ba'i gronapas su// so so'i rigs kyi phyag rgyas gang gi/ phyag rgya bkod de bskal bar bya// phung po gzhal yas 'ang bya// nang
316a4: thams cad ltar sgobs te/ / bsgral sbyangs sbyar ba byas na ni// mchod dang panyes dang dam skongs dang // dngos grub rnam gsum thob nas blang // zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni mchog phran gtsang ma bsgrub pa'i
316a5: thabs so/ / ma Na Dal dru ba'i chang ldan la// zla ga pa sgo gcig rdo rjes bskor// bu khyud sgo bzhi rab tu bri// khyu mchog dbang po phyed ldan la// phyi nang khrus kyang de bzhin bya// dbus su bzhag ste shar du bstan
316a6: lce la gzungs thag sna lngas gdags/ / man dag/ lung ldan phyag tu dbul// phyag rgya rdzas dang bcas par dgrapa// de'i khong du gzhal yas su// ye shes sems dpa' tshon gang ba'i// thugs kar no
316a7: bu ri chen 'bar/ / dbus su nyi ma'i gzul// dpal be'u nyungs 'bru'i snying po la// til 'bru tsam gyi hUM dmar gnas// rdo rje 'phro 'du rgan mi gcad// rdo rje bre yang dbab par bya// de nas mtshan rtags
316a8: ba dang / / dngos grub blangs te bsgral bar bya// bskams te bdud rtsi'i rtse bar shes// zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni dregs pa can padan pa bsgrub pa'i thabs so// phun sub tshogs pa ni ldan
316b1: rnga ltar rigs pa 'dus pa dang / / mal bzhi gcig brnyad rul bya// ngag bas pa stong pa'i Na ni// gru bzhir gzhi las sngags par bya// de ra nga gzugs su pa// skang kha zad radags su bsngo pa// ma ma la ca
316b2: gtu gzhug/ dbus su 'khor lo 'thig gtab la// dpal chen lnga 'i brag rgya bzhag/ bar khya ba'i gnyis kyis mdze' pa la// gnas dang yul gyi phyag cang gong // sgo 'azhir sa sungs de bzhin gzhag/ yan lag
316b3: pang bgo ba dUr gnas/ / phyi rol khya pagal pa dbya// de mtha' thod pa po gsum bsdams// de yi phyi rim me bur 'dub// gu gu thul dang / zar tshags// zhang dang sbrul dran ste khud la// phan du snying por bcas pa dag/
316b4: gnas su de bzhin gzhag/ rdo rje'i 'bebs su brtsegs pa'i thang// bur bzhir bzhi dag la bya// snying bar 'khor lor thang su bya// rig pa dang mthun pa'i yas shing bgyis/ haM pa la 'brel ba' la bded pa// thab khung lnga
316b5: ba zag tu/ / d+hang drag sa pa shing spangs pa las// ye shes lnga yi ma grong du// nyon mongs lnga pa bsreg spyang thib// bya bar 'os pa 'tha' dag lda// dpa 'byer can mas cing gas bya// zhes gsungs so// de la 'dini ma tang
316b6: 'bring ba da pa thabs / / dkyil 'khor ma gtang gzugs su bya// mgo ba lho nub mtshams su bstan// bgo lus yan lag rnams la na// ma ra Tal bcu gcig rab tu bya// zhal du hA ma lung gru gsum la// yab sha
316b7: gas brdzas da / / swA pasreg com gyi las rnams bya// snying khar gru gsum rtsa gsub la// bang ram gsub par byas nas ni// bur bu nyi shu ra ba yang po// ke brel ting 'dzin bya// b+habar gro gsub thing napa
316b8: lazung la zi pa nga gsum po/ / gzhung bdun dgra sta brgyad kyang dgor// phur bu dgu dang kha d+ma dgu// rtsang dmar drug bcu rtsa brgyad dgod// yum gyi mkha' ru bsgobs nas su// gzir mnan drag po'alas rnams bya//
317a1: yan lag migo mtshan g.yas g.yon la// gnas kyam po 'tshan rnams kyi/ brilab mtshan ma gzhag par dbya/ gtan rnams kyang na ci gas par// mata gag nga ba dang mnan/ rkyen
317a2: mkham pas sum bzhin bya/ bya ba thams cad ci gas kyi// des ni mngon pa'i las chen grub ces gsungs so// de la 'don rdo bsgrubapa thabs so// thams cad 'byor bar byas nas ni// sa sangs pa
317a3: lags byas pa/ / dbus su pa ma 'dab brgyad la// b+hag me dmar po sgo bzhing ldan// rdo rje'i rabs bskod pa bya// dpal ldan rdzo sa b+ha ga d+ha dgo// na chenas tshogs thub pa la/ yo rjes kyis grang ba // pa
317a4: dasal bkab la/ / gzungs thag btags nas dbus su gzhag/ che dpag med par de mnga' gsol// bum pa rin chen las byas pa'o// gsang ba'i yum du de mda' gsol// rigs dang mthun pa'i bum pa bzhi// rigs
317a5: lnga'i sangs rgyas gtso gzungs dang / / so so'i 'khor kyi sems dpa' rnams// gcog zungs zung du 'brel bar ni// phyogs phyogs rag du tsam bung bri// sgo bo zhing sgo spangs la sogs bzhag/ sems dpa'i phyag tu
317a6: kun bkang nas/ / tshe dpag med pa'i thugs ka nas// 'khyil cing 'tshor ba'i byang chub sems// nyi zla'i ga'u gnas pa'o// a yu byang chub sems su zhwa/ de las rgyal mtshan mchod ldan dang // rin chen gter dang dbang
317a7: bsung mdzad/ / gsang ba'i tshe gtor 'dzin dang bzhi// thugs dkar 'phros nas de bzhin du/ chom bu rims kyi spros nas ni// dkang dmang 'od kyis bdag la rims// skye med dbyings su sbas nas tsa mI gyur phyu
317a8: saM gdapa par bya/ / yang na ting 'dzin khyad par gyis// l-i' ma zla ba mthar dag tu// sgra ngas ras 'i dus sun// phyag rgya chen pos gnas pades// gang phyogs nges su la bltos te// lha zu gzad sbyin ji snyeng sa

319a1: dang dbyas pas spangs pa yin/ / ma la yang rnam gsum te// ngam cig dbang dang shes rab zung // ma dag lang son slobang pon la// mdo dang dbya ba'i sems byong / sa ngag na dus
